After he and his wife separated, Rufino set out to pursue life as a businessman alone, since his children are now independent adults. He once wanted to become a teacher, since he has always seen himself as having a talent for teaching but, unfortunately, he was not able to realize this dream because his parents did not have the money to pay for his studies. 

Rufino has confronted many challenges and has gradually excelled. Consequently through a great deal of hard work he was able to accumulate enough money to open his store in a rented space. There he sells clothing.

Currently, Rufino needs a little help in order to purchase new clothing (polo shirts, shorts, pants, etc). His customers are always asking him if he has the latest models and designs. This is the main reason that he wants to grow as a small businessman: he knows that if he has more inventory, his income will improve. He also wants to be able to open a new clothing venue but this time he wants to own the shop. Thus he will not have to pay rent and can save money so that he can gradually turn his great dream into reality. His dream is to own a national chain of clothing stores.

loans.use: to purchase clothing (polo shirts, shorts, pants, etc.)

loans.name: Ivan Edwin

texts.es: El Sr. Iván  tiene 33 años y no es casado pero convive con su pareja con la cual tiene 3 hijos que son de las edades de  14, 10 y 8 años, se dedica a la  venta de ropa interior de manera ambulante en distintas zonas de la ciudad de Cochabamba este préstamo su segunda secuencia dentro de la institución, El Sr. Iván utilizara este préstamo para la compra de mercadería ropa interior por mayor para  su negocio, El Sr. Iván  enfrenta retos en su negocio que son competencia y  utilizara los beneficios para mejorar su calidad de vida, su deseo para su negocio  es poder comprar un  puesto fijo, se siente muy agradecido por la oportunidad que le brindan ya que esta es su única actividad para sacar a su familia adelante.
texts.en:
Iván is 33 years old, single, but lives with his partner with whom he has 3 children who are the ages of 14, 10, and 8 years old. 

He works selling underwear as a traveling salesman in different areas of the city of Cochabamba. 

This is his second loan sequence with the institution. Iván will use the money from this loan to buy underwear at wholesale prices for his business. Iván  faces challenges in his business, that of competition, and he uses the profits to improve his quality of life. 

His dream for his business is to be able to buy a facility. He feels very grateful for the opportunity given to him as this is his only activity to move his family forward.

loans.use: to buy underwear at wholesale prices as merchandise

loans.name: Maly

texts.en:
Maly, 50, is married and resides with her husband and three children in Prey Veng Province, Cambodia. She has been selling groceries for over six years, earning approximately US $3 per day. Her husband helps her run the business. All of her children are construction workers, earning approximately US $9 per day.

In order to improve her family’s livelihood, Maly is requesting a loan of US $500 in order to purchase more groceries to sell. In so doing, she will be able to generate more income to support the family. In the future, Maly would like to use any further profits to expand her business and to rebuild her present house to make it stronger to provide better living conditions for the family.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell

loans.name: Blanca Rosa

texts.es:
Blanca es una mujer muy luchadora y tiene mucho carisma, madre de 4 hijos de los cuales tres ya son mayores y solo la menor de ellos vive con ella,  la quiere muchísimo y por ello ella trabaja con todas sus fuerzas para darle lo necesario pero lo mas importante para que sea feliz, es su conchito como decimos en Perú porque es muy apegada a ella y a pesar de lo pequeña que es la apoya mucho. Su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de Imperial, ciudad que se caracteriza por su clima cálido, por su agricultura y sobre todo porque sus pobladores irradian de generosidad.  Blanca aprendió a ganarse el pan con el sudor de su frente desde muy joven y sobre todo cuando se convirtió en madre trabajo en varios oficios ya que tenía que llevar el sustento a su hogar, anteriormente trabajo haciendo limpieza en casas ajenas, luego trabajo en el campo y con los ahorros que pudo juntar logro iniciar su negocio de librería en su vivienda, en el cual trabaja actualmente; ella no le dice no al trabajo sino mas bien trabaja en todo lo que pueda ya que con tal que sea honrado eso importa; por ello a pesar de tener su negocio de librería ella también trabaja cuidando a una pequeña de lunes a viernes en horas de la mañana; tiene mucha paciencia con los niños por ello le tienen mucha confianza ; ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amable, tienen paciencia y sobre todo porque agradece a Dios por permitir que ella tenga un trabajo y poder salir adelante.

Blanca está muy agradecida con los prestatarios kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar mas útiles para su negocio de librería en especial cuadernos, folders, hojas, lapiceros, entre otros, lo que le permitirá tener más variedad de productos para ofrecer a sus clientes y seguir trabajando día a día para hacer realidad su gran sueño:”  Darle una buena educación a su hija y tener sucursales de su negocio”.
texts.en:
Blanca is a fighter and a woman with a lot of charisma.  She is the mother of four children; three are grown and only the youngest of them lives with her.  She loves her very much and she works with all her strength to give her everything she needs, although the most important thing is for her to be happy.  She is Blanca's "conchito," as we say in Peru [youngest child], because she is very devoted and in spite of how little she is, she helps her mother a lot.  Her house is located in the city of Imperial, a city known for its warm climate, its agriculture, and especially because the residents radiate generosity.

Blanca learned to earn a living with the sweat of her brow from a very young age, especially when she became a mother.  She worked in various jobs because she had to support her household.  Previously she worked cleaning houses, then she worked in the fields.  With the savings she managed to put together she started her bookstore business in her house, where she currently works.

She does not say no to work; she works in everything she can because as long as it is honorable, it matters.  This is why, despite having her bookstore, she also works caring for a little girl from Monday through Friday in the morning.  She has a lot of patience with children and so they trust her.  She believes that it is going well for her in her business because she is very friendly and patient, and especially because she is thankful to God for allowing her to have a job and for being able to get ahead.

Blanca is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because, thanks to the help they have given her, she will be able to buy more supplies for her bookstore business, especially notebooks, folders, paper, and pens, among others.  This will allow her to have more variety of products to sell to her customers and to continue working every day to make her big dream a reality: "To give her daughter a good education and to have branches of her business."

loans.use: to buy supplies (notebooks, folders, paper, and pens, among others).

loans.name: Yafet

texts.en:
Yafet is a 49-year-old man who is married to Rosalina, a 37-year-old lady. From the marriage, they are blessed with nine children. Two of them are working and others are still attending school. As a father of nine children, Yafet has to work hard to cover his family needs and his children's school fees. 

Every day Yafet struggles to meet the household needs by selling balls using a cart. Yafet has been running the business for years. He enjoys running this business. Every day Yafet walks with the cart from one place to another to sell balls and toys. Yafet also buys used bottles from people and resells them to the supplier. 

Yafet plans to add more balls and toys and to buy used bottles but he needs more capital to do so. Therefore Yafet submitted a loan application and requested a loan of IDR 5,000,000 from TLM.

loans.use: to purchase more balls and toys and to buy used bottles to resell to the supplier.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more rice, eggs, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Mario Eduardo

texts.es:
Mario tiene 31 años de edad, es soltero, tiene 3 hijos de 7, 5 Y 3 años de edad, y de los cuales los dos mayores estudian, vive en la Ceiba, Atlántida.
Mario Eduardo trabajaba en una empresa de transporte. Pero hace 2 años y medio se independizo en su propio negocio. El presta los servicios de trasporte de carga, como envió de encomiendas, paquetes, fuera de la ciudad, hace mudanzas y fletes.  Se motivo a dedicarse a este negocio porque tenía la experiencia de trabajar en este ramo del transporte. Manifiesta que tiene un contrato de alquiler de sus servicios con una empresa privada. Y que por lo tanto su negocio esta muy bien y ha crecido bastante y sus ingresos son a diario. El dedica a este negocio todo el día.
Ha solicitados su primer préstamo  con ODEF de 15,000 lempiras, para comprar repuestos para el vehículo que es su herramienta de trabajo que utiliza para dar el servicio.
Su meta es pagar el vehículo en el que actualmente trabaja y poder comprar otro vehículo para poder extenderse mas en la zona.
texts.en:
Mario is 31 years old, he is single and has three children that are seven, five and three years old. The two oldest study. He lives in La Ceiba, Atlántida.

Mario Eduardo used to work in a transportation business. Two and a half years ago he started his own independent business. He offers shipping services transporting things like packages and parcels outside of the city. He also offers moving services and public transport. He wanted to start making his living doing this business because he had experience working in the transportation sector. He says that he has a contract in which he offers his services to a private company and as a result his business is very good and has grown quite a lot. He makes a daily income as well. He works at this business every day. 

He has requested his first loan with ODEF for 15,000 lempiras in order to buy parts for the vehicle that is the basis of the work he does and that he uses to offer his services. 

Hi goal is to pay for the vehicle that he currently uses and be able to buy another vehicle so that he can expand more in the area.

loans.use: to buy parts for the vehicle he works in.

loans.name: Pauline

texts.fr:
Pauline est une jeune femme agée de 42 ans, célibataire quatre enfants dont l'age varie entre 3 et 10 ans, tous vont déjà à l'école. Elle a un petit institut de beauté depuis 2 ans qu'elle gère avec beaucoup de serieux. Elle sollicite un crédit pour s'acheter des produits de beauté et esthétique, certains appareils important pour son salon pour pouvoir satisfaire non seulement sa clientèle mais aussi accroitre ses revenus.

le benéfice tiré de ce prêt lui permettra d'agrandir son activité avec le temps, de subvenir à ses besoins, mais aussi aux besoins grandisssants de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Pauline is a young woman, 42 years old, who is unmarried. She has four children, whose ages range from 3 to 10 years old. All of them are already going to school. She has had a small beauty parlor for two years that she manages very seriously. 

Pauline is requesting a loan to buy cosmetics and aesthetic products, as well as certain important equipment for her salon, so as to satisfy not only her customers but also to increase her revenues. 

The profits derived from this loan will enable her to expand her business over time and to meet her needs, as well as those of her growing children.

loans.use: to buy equipment and cosmetic products

loans.name: Grace

texts.en: Grace is a 32-year-old lady dealing in a salon business. She has operated it for seven years and she started with capital got from the bank as a loan. She faces a problem of inadequate capital to facilitate the business and pay local taxes imposed. Grace would like most to build a permanent home and move her business to a more permanent location. She wants a loan to buy cosmetics for sale.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics for sale.

loans.name: Genaro

texts.es: Genaro de 60 años de edad , casado, es de la comunidad de Tomatoyita- Teustepe. Empezó a trabajar en la agricultura a los 12 años de edad como jornalero,  luego a la edad de 20 años formo su propia familia, como parte de su esfuerzo  posee sus tierras y sus vacas que pudo comprar producto de la ganancia que le genero la cosecha. El no tiene nadie a su cargo ya que sus hijos están casados y tienen su vida independiente, debido a eso el  tiene que pagar mozos para que le ayuden en las labores agrícolas, una ves que sale la siembra frijol y maíz el vende sus productos en Teustepe o en Boaco aunque después de la cosecha el viaja a otras regiones a cortar café.  Genaro esta solicitando este crédito para comprar la semilla del frijol, los insumos y el abono que utilizara en la siembra. Este crédito lo ayudara ya que podrá realizar su siembra de granos básicos. El espera que la cosecha sea muy buena para obtener  ganancia y pagar  el crédito también desea comprar ternero para criar y venderlo a un mejor precio para buscar mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Genaro is 60 years old, married and is from the community of Tomatoyita-Teustepe. He began working in agriculture when he was 12 years old as a laborer, and later at the age of 20 he formed his own family. Through his endeavors he bought his land and his cows which he was able to buy from the earnings of the harvests that he reaped.

His children are married and live independently and are not under his care, and because of this he has to pay farm laborers to help him farm. When the beans and corn are ready he sells his products in Teustepe or in Boaco and then after the harvest he travels to other regions to pick coffee.

Genaro is asking for a loan in order to buy bean seed, supplies and fertilizer to use when planting. This loan will help him grow a seed of basic grains. 

He dreams that the harvest will be good in order to have a profit and to repay the loan. Also he hopes to buy a calf to raise and to sell at a good price in search of better income.

loans.use: to buy bean seeds, supplies and fertilizer to use in planting

loans.name: Benkadi Group

texts.fr:
Mariées majoritairement dans des familles polygames les 5 femmes du groupe  Benkadi  ont  en moyenne 38 ans et 5 enfants. Elles habitent toutes dans la préfecture de Koutiala et se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage, de parenté et de leurs activités professionnelles. 
Elles font l’achat et la vente de produits cosmétiques, d’habits, de pagnes des boissons et des céréales. 
Dans le but d’augmenter leurs fonds de commerce, les membres du groupe ont intégré Soro Yiriwaso  et sont à leur 8 eme  prêt solidaire, après avoir correctement remboursés les 7 précédents.
Madame,   Fanta   (première femme assise de la droite vers la gauche sur la photo) fait la vente de produits cosmétiques. Elle est très sollicitée et appréciée pour la qualité de ses produits. 
Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter, 3 cartons de crèmes, 2 cartons de parfums et déodorants, 1 carton de vernis et de gels. 
Elle s’approvisionne auprès des grossistes de la place et effectue ses ventes à la maison et au marché, essentiellement au comptant et en détail, à une clientèle composée  d’hommes et de femmes. 
Avec ce prêt, Madame Fanta espère réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 65.000 FCFA qui sera utilisé pour être réinvesti dans l’activité et prendre en charge certains besoins du foyer.
texts.en:
For the most part married in polygamous families, the five women of the group Benkadi average 38 years of age and five children each. They all live in Koutiala prefecture and know one another through ties of community, kinship, and their professional work. The women buy and sell cosmetic products, clothing, <i>pagnes<i/> (the colorful cloth of western Africa), beverages, and grains.

With the goal of increasing their business capital, the group members joined the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso and are now their eighth solidarity loan after having correctly repaid the seven previous ones. 

Ms. Fanta (the first woman seated from right to left in the photo) sells cosmetics. She is in high demand and much appreciated for the quality of her products. She intends to use her loan to buy 3 boxes of creams, 2 boxes of perfumes and deodorants, and a box of nail polishes and gels. 

She gets her supplies from local wholesalers. Accepting cash, she make her retail sales out of her house and at the market. Her customer base is composed of men and women. 

With this loan, Ms. Fanta hopes to make an average monthly profit 65,000 francs CFA that will be use for reinvesting in her business and meeting certain household needs.

loans.use: to buy cosmetic products

loans.name: Chreb

texts.en:
Chreb, 37, is married and resides with her husband and two children in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She and her husband have been involved in agricultural business for over five years and are successful in their career. They are involved in growing rice and breeding ducks to get eggs to sell. Approximately, they earn USD 8 per day.

 Due to lack of funds, Chreb is requesting a loan of USD 300 to purchase fodder for feeding their ducks. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children get Bachelor’s degrees.

loans.use: to purchase fodder for feeding her ducks

loans.name: Jane

texts.en: Jane is a 44-year-old lady with six children, practicing agriculture as her primary business, though she is a teacher by profession. She says she has practiced it for 15 years and faces a problem of inadequate capital to facilitate the activity. Jane would like most to educate her children and build a permanent home. She would like to diversify and start rearing chickens. Jane wants a loan to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for her children.

loans.name: Tsermaa

texts.en:
Tsermaa is a 55-year-old woman who lives with her daughter and her infirm spouse in a small apartment. Her daughter is a high school pupil, and her husband became infirm a few years ago. 

Aside from looking after her spouse, she supports her family by operating a pharmacy business downstairs from her apartment. She is a very hard-working and strong woman who vows to live her life only for her family. 

“I have a few years' experience in the pharmacy business and I really appreciate that my business has expanded since I started it. If I buy a cash register, I can save all incoming funds there, not in my wallet. It's more comfortable for me and safer for my micro business,” she said happily.  

Tsermaa is requesting a 1,500,000 Mongolian Tugriks (MNT) to purchase a cash register for her pharmacy.

loans.use: to purchase a cash register for her pharmacy.

loans.name: Philip

texts.en:
Philip is 40 years old and a milk vendor, married and blessed with four children. He has been a milk vendor for the past 13 years and earns a monthly income of Kes 30,000 per month. He has requested his first loan with KADET Ltd of Kes 30,000 to purchase more milk for sale. 

His hopes and dreams are to expand his business as well as build rental houses.

loans.use: To purchase more milk for sale.

loans.name: Tserenpeljee

texts.en:
Mr. Tserenpiljee, 38 runs a taxi business around Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He lives with his wife and 2 children in a rental apartment. His wife is unemployed and has stayed at home to care for the children for the last few years.

Tserenpiljee started his taxi business in 2008 but his income is not enough to cover his family's expenses. He therefore decided to start a second business, a tire repair service, with his younger brothers. Tserenpiljee thinks it is very beneficial and important to improve his family's income in the future. Last month Tserenpiljee and his brothers purchased the equipment for the tire repair service. He needs to have a workshop for his new business and he is planning to build it by himself over the next 3 months. The loan he is taking will be dedicated to purchasing the building materials to build his workshop.

loans.use: To purchase materials to build his workshop.

loans.name: Kutfillokhoja

texts.ru: Кутфиллохоча женат и на воспитании имеет пятерых детей. Более 10 лет он занимается купле- продажей крупного рогатого скота. Он приобретает скот с местных рынков, затем откармливая их реализует за хорошую цену. Имеет хорошие условия для откорма скота, в настоящее время имеет 5 голов крупного и 7 голов мелкого рогатого скота. Кредитуется на 9-ом цикле в ИМОН Интернешнл и имеет хорошую репутацию и кредитную историю. Кутфиллохоча запрашивает займ для покупки крупного и мелкого рогатого скота, так как в настоящее время цены на скота снизились.
texts.en: Kutfillokhoja is married and has five children. For more than ten years he has been buying and selling large horned cattle. He buys the cattle on the local markets and then resells it for a good price after feeding. He has good conditions for the feeding of cattle and at this time has five heads of large and seven heads of small horned cattle. This is his ninth loan cycle at IMON INternational and he has a good reputation and credit history. Kutfillokhoja is asking for a loan to buy large and small horned cattle as at this time the prices on cattle went down.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Benkola Group

texts.fr:
Mariées exclusivement dans des familles traditionnelles, les femmes du groupe  Benkola  ont  en moyenne 39 ans et 5 enfants. Elles habitent toutes dans la ville de Koutiala et se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage, de parenté et de leurs activités professionnelles. Elles font l’achat et la vente de Sounbala, de fruits et légumes et de poissons.
Dans le but d’augmenter leurs fonds de commerce, les membres du groupe ont intégré Soro Yiriwaso  et sont à leur 4 eme  prêt solidaire, après avoir correctement remboursés les 3 précédents.
Madame,  Mariam (deuxième femme de la droite vers la gauche sur la photo) est une  vendeuse de Sounbala  qui est très sollicitée et appréciée pour la qualité de ses produits. 
Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter,  10 paniers Sounbala auprès des transformatrices de la place et effectue ses ventes, en détail, au comptant et souvent à crédit, à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. 
Avec ce prêt, Madame  Mariam  espère réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 30.000 FCFA qui sera utilisé pour être réinvesti dans l’activité et prendre en charge certains besoins du foyer.
texts.en:
Married exclusively in traditional families, the women of the group Benkola average 39 years of age and five children each. They all live in Koutiala City and know one another through ties of community, kinship, and their professional work. The women buy and sell <i>sounbala<i/> [a condiment made from pounded and fermented seeds or nuts], fruit and vegetables, and fish. 

With the goal of increasing their business capital, the group members joined the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso and are now on their fourth solidarity loan after having correctly repaid the three previous ones. 

Ms. Mariam (the second woman seated from right to left in the photo) sells <i>sounbala<i/>. She is in high demand and much appreciated for the quality of her products. She intends to use her loan to buy 10 baskets of <i>sounbala<i/> from local makers. Accepting cash, and credit often, she sells retail to a customer base is composed of men and women. 

With this loan, Ms. Mariam hopes to make an average monthly profit of 30,000 francs CFA that will be use for reinvesting in her business and meeting certain household needs.

loans.use: to buy "sounbala"

loans.name: Oun

texts.en: Oun is married and a mother of three children, all of whom are still her dependents. She is 36 years old and lives in Kompong Cham province. She received the first loan from VisionFund in 2011. Oun owns a small store selling Cambodian noodles and some grocery products. She also buys fruit from others for resale to make additional income to support her family. Recently, she requested another loan from VisionFund to buy fruit such as mangoes for resale. She hopes to raise more income from selling this fruit and also to send all her children to school.

loans.use: To buy fruits for resale

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: José

texts.es:
El señor José tiene 50 años de edad, vive con su esposa y sus cinco hijos quienes les ayudan a trabajar en la siembra. Él se dedica a la agricultura desde que tenía 10 años de edad, fue su papá quien le enseño este trabajo. José siembra maíz desde hace 20 años, se levanta a las 4:00 a.m. a ordeñar sus vacas, alimenta a los animales, los lleva  al terreno, luego se dirige al lugar donde tiene sus cultivos a trabajar durante toda la mañana y regresa a la 1:00 p.m. a almorzar y estar con su familia.

Los insumos para la siembra, los compra en una ciudad, para llegar ahí debe caminar tres kilómetros para llegar a la parada de buses, el autobús tarda media hora, luego regresa a su vivienda a pie. El préstamo que esta solicitando es para la compra de insumos agrícolas y si le alcanza comprara otra vaca, para incrementar la producción de leche. Con la inversión José podrá comprar abono y semilla, para sembrar y obtener una buena cosecha para el sustento de él y su familia.

Él desea reparar su vivienda, ya que vive en una casa de lámina y desea construirla de ladrillo, porque en invierno se mojan bastante.
texts.en:
José is 50, and lives with his wife and their five children, who help them with the planting work. He has farmed since he was 10 years old; it was his father who taught him this work.   

José has been growing corn for 20 years. He gets up at 4:00am to milk his cows. He feeds the animals and takes them to the fields. Then he heads to the place where he has his crops to work all morning, and returns at 1:00pm to have lunch and be with his family.

He buys the supplies for planting in the city. To get there he must walk three kilometers to get to the bus stop. The bus takes an hour, and later he returns to his house on foot. The loan he is applying for is to buy agricultural supplies, and if there is enough money, buy another cow, in order to increase his milk production.

With the investment, José will be able to buy fertilizer and seed, in order to plant and get a good harvest to support him and his family. 

He wishes to repair his home, as he lives in a house made of sheet metal and he wishes to build one made of brick, because in winter they get quite wet.

loans.use: To buy agricultural supplies, and if there is enough money, buy another cow to increase his milk production.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en: Elizabeth is a 37-year-old single mother of 4 children. She has been selling vegetables and other groceries at the local open air market for the last 7 years. She was introduced to KADET by one of the field officers. Elizabeth plans to use this loan to buy more stock of vegetables and groceries to sell to sustain the increasing demand and to make extra profits. In the future, Elizabeth hopes to expand her business and get enough cash to be able to start large scale farming.

loans.use: To buy more stock of vegetables and other groceries

loans.name: Mariam

texts.fr:
Née vers 1983 à M‘pessoba , Mariam a 3 enfants et vit dans une famille polygame avec son conjoint à Koutiala.
N’ayant pas eu la chance d’aller à l’école pour des raisons sociales, très vite elle s’intéressa aux activités génératrices de revenus, notamment à l’achat vente d’articles divers de commerce : chaussures, habits, tissus, pagnes wax et draps de lit.
Nantie de 5 ans d’expériences, elle est très appréciée et sollicitée à Koutiala et environs.
Après avoir correctement remboursé le premier prêt, elle est à son deuxième qui sera utiliser pour acheter, 10 pièces de pagnes wax et autres au Burkina Faso. Elle effectue ses ventes en détail au comptant et à crédit, en ambulant et à la maison à une clientèle mixte.
Mariam envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel de 30.000 FCFA qui sera utilisé pour rembourser le prêt et aider son mari à subvenir aux dépenses de la famille.
texts.en:
Born around 1983 in M‘pessoba, Mariam has three children and lives in a polygamous family with her spouse in Koutiala. Not having had the good fortune to attend school because of social reasons, she began early on to be interested in money-earning activities, notably the purchase of various merchandise for resale such as shoes, garments, cloth, "wax" African print lengths, and sheets. 

Blessed with five years of experience, she is much appreciated and sought after in Koutiala and its surroundings. After having correctly reimbursed her first loan, she is on her second, which will be used to buy 10 lengths of "wax" cloth and other sorts in Burkina Faso. She sells retail for cash or credit, door-to-door and out of her home, to a clientele of men and women. 


Mariam expects to make a monthly profit of 30,000 F CFA which will be used to reimburse the loan and help her husband to support the family.

loans.use: to buy "wax" African print cloth.

loans.name: Marites

texts.en:
Marites, 36 years old, is married to Florencio, a farmer. The couple has been blessed with four children; the eldest is already a graduate of a vocational course, two are still studying and the youngest is an infant.

Currently, Marites works at a magnolia company. For additional income, she also runs a hog raising business. She is really thankful because she is able to cover all of the family's daily household expenses and her two children's daily allowances.

Marites' greatest aims are to send her children to higher levels of education and to improve her financial stability. To make her plan a reality, she is asking for a bigger loan, in the amount of PHP 25,000, to buy three piglets and livestock feed. Marites knows that her patience and sacrifices will give her hope in attaining success in life.

loans.use: to buy livestock feed and three piglets

loans.name: Mahamadou  Alassane

texts.fr:
Né vers 1973 à Bamako , Mahamadou a 5 enfants et vit dans une famille polygame avec se conjointe à Koutiala.
N’ayant pas eu la chance d’avancer à l’école pour des raisons sociales, très vite il s’intéressa aux activités génératrices de revenus, notamment à l’achat vente de divers pièces détachées : neuves, d’occasions, pneumatique etc.
Nanti de 19 années d’expériences dans le domaine, Mahamadou est très apprécié et sollicité à Koutiala et environs par diverses couches socioprofessionnelles. 
Dans le souci de satisfaire le besoin de sa clientèle de plus en plus nombreuses, il décide de collaborer avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso. Il est à son premier prêt  qui sera utilisé pour acheter, 60 pneus sur place à Koutiala auprès des grossistes. Il effectue ses ventes en détail au comptant et à crédit, dans sa boutique, à une clientèle mixte.
Mahamadou envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel de 150.000 FCFA qui sera utilisé pour rembourser le prêt et subvenir aux dépenses de la famille.
texts.en:
Born around 1973 in Bamako, Mr. Mahamadou has five children and lives in a polygamous family with his spouse[s] in Koutiala. Not having had the chance to advance in school due to societal reasons, he soon became interested in revenue-generating businesses, especially the buying and selling of various replacement parts: new, used, inflatable, etc. 

Privileged with nineteens years of experience in this domain, Mahamadou is much appreciated and in high demand in and around Koutiala by diverse socio-professional strata. 

Concerned about meeting the needs of his burgeoning customer base, he decided to collaborate with the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso. He is on his first loan, which will be used for buying 60 tires from wholesalers, locally in Koutiala. Accepting cash, he sells retail in a store to a mixed customer base. 

Mahamadou envisions making a monthly profit of 150,000 francs CFA that will be used for repaying the loan and covering family expenses.

loans.use: to buy tires

loans.name: Francisca

texts.en:
Francisca’s goal in life is to lift her family out of poverty. She works hard to attain her goal, inspired by her four children, two of whom are in school.

Francisca, 55 years old, is married. She is a vendor who has been selling toys and bags in the market for 35 years. She is proud to share that, through her income from the business, she has been able to provide her two eldest children's school allowances and fees and they are now degree holders. Francisca's husband is also a vendor.

Francisca wishes that she could sell more items and gain a higher income to further support her children's needs in school. She is requesting a loan of PHP 50,000 to buy additional bags and toys to sell in the market.

loans.use: to buy additional bags and toys to sell in the market.

loans.name: Penda

texts.fr:
Née vers 1970 à Ségou , Penda a 3 enfants et vit dans une famille polygame avec son conjoint à Koutiala, dans le quartier koko.
N’ayant pas eu la chance d’aller à l’école pour des raisons sociales, très vite elle s’intéressa aux activités génératrices de revenus, notamment à l’achat vente d’articles divers de commerce : parures, habits, tissus, pagnes wax et draps de lit.
Nantie de 23 ans d’expériences, elle est très appréciée et sollicitée à Koutiala et environs.
Après avoir correctement remboursé le premier prêt, elle est à son deuxième qui sera utiliser pour acheter, 10 pièces de pagnes wax et 10 complets de brodés au Burkina Faso. Elle effectue ses ventes en détail au comptant et à crédit, en ambulant et à la maison à une clientèle mixte.
Penda envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel de 40.000 FCFA qui sera utilisé pour rembourser le prêt et aider son mari à subvenir aux dépenses de la famille.
texts.en:
Born around 1970 in Ségou, Penda has three children and lives in a polygamous family with her spouse in Koutiala, in Koko district. Not having had the good fortune to go to school because of societal reasons, she soon became interested in money-earning activities, notably buying and selling various sorts of merchandise: necklaces, clothing, lengths of cloth, lengths of "wax" print, and bed sheets. 

Endowed with 23 years of experience, she is much appreciated and sought after in Koutiala and its surroundings. After having correctly reimbursed her first loan, she is on her second which will be used to buy 10 lengths of "wax" print cloth and 10 embroidered outfits in Burkino Faso. She sells retail, for cash or credit, door-to-door and out of her home to a mixed clientele. 

Penda expects to make a monthly profit of 40,000 F CFA which will be used to reimburse the loan and to help her husband to support their family.

loans.use: to purchase clothing

loans.name: Isael

texts.es: Isael de cuarenta y uno años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos. Él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y de sorgo, se ha hecho de mucha experiencia en su labor y tiene variedad de clientes, últimamente ha aumentado la demanda pues el producto es de muy buena calidad y lo vende a precio accesibles además el servicio es el mejor dela zona; Isael es un hombre enérgico, muy orgulloso de su trabajo, le gusta mantenerse adelante de la competencia, piensa que quien va cuesta arriba, solo necesita motivación para nunca cambiar su rumbo y es con este pensamiento que se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz y sorgo por mayor. Isael tiene fe que así logrará mantener a su familia en condiciones de una vida digna.
texts.en:
Isael is 41, and lives with his life partner and their children. He grows corn and sorghum. He has gotten a lot of experience in his work, and has a variety of customers. Lately demand has increased as the product is very good quality, and he sells it at an affordable price. Besides, the service is the best in the area. 

Isael is an energetic man, very proud of his work. He likes to keep ahead of the competition. He believes that he who goes uphill only needs motivation to never change his course, and it is with this thought that he decided to apply to Integral for a loan that will allow him to buy corn and sorghum at wholesale. 

Isael has faith that that in this way, he will manage to support his family and enable them to have a decent life.

loans.use: To buy corn and sorghum at wholesale.

loans.name: Duterimbere/kzr Group

texts.fr:
Zachée fait partie du groupe Duterimbere/Kzr. Il a 38 ans, il est marie avec 5 enfants de 4an à 13 ans, dont 3 scolarises. Son niveau d’éducation est de 6 ans de primaire.

Zachée est agriculteur de riz. C’est son deuxième cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter des engrais chimique et payer la main d’œuvre.

Sa stratégie pour la croissance de son business est d’utiliser des semences sélectionnées et des engrais chimiques pour son agriculture de riz. Dans les prochaines années, Zachée voudrait être le premier agriculteur dans sa région. Avec les profits, il prévoit de scolariser ses enfants
texts.en:
Zachée is part of the group called Duterimbere/Kzr. He is 38 years old and married with five children from four to 13 years of age, three of them attending school. His own educational level is 6 years of primary school. 

Zachée is a rice grower. This is his second loan with ACB. He is going to use his loan to buy chemical fertilizer and pay for labor. 

His strategy for growing his business is to use select seed and chemical fertilizer for his rice farming. In the coming years, Zachée would like to be the foremost agriculturalist in his region. He expects to use the profit to pay his children's school fees.

loans.use: to buy chemical fertilizer and pay for labor.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and pay labour costs.

loans.name: Akoko

texts.fr: Akoko est revendeuse de produits de beauté depuis 2011. Elle a 23ans et sert ses clients  dans une boutique. Elle est à son premier crédit et sollicite ce prêt pour acheter des chaussures, des produits de beauté et bijoux. Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité, assurer la prospérité de son activité.
texts.en: Akoko has been in retail selling beauty products since 2011.  She is 23 years old and serves her clientele from a boutique.  This is her first loan, which she will use to purchase shoes, beauty products, and jewelry. She wants to reinvest in her business and ensure its prosperity.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetic products.

loans.name: Soatbeki

texts.ru: На протяжении 3-х лет Соатбеки занимается купле- продажей крупного рогатого скота на  рынке. Он активный и трудолюбивый юноша, ему 22 года. Соатбеки начинал свой бизнес с малого оборота, а теперь в обороте имеет 5 голов крупного рогатого скота. Он содержит скот в хороших условиях и хорошо ухаживает за ними. Соатбеки хотел бы получить займ для покупки крупного рогатого скота и корма для них. Таким образом, он хочет расширить свой бизнес, чтобы получить желаемую прибыль. Он надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en: Soatbeki has been involved in buying and selling cattle at a market for three years.  He is an active and hardworking young man; he is 22 years old.  Soatbeki started his business with a small turnover and now has a capital of five heads of cattle.  He keeps livestock in good conditions and takes good care of them.  Soatbeki wants to obtain this loan to buy cattle and livestock feed.  Thus, he wants to expand his business in order to make a desired profit.  He relies on your help and mercy.

loans.use: to buy cattle and livestock feed

loans.name: Kodzo

texts.fr:
Kodzo est un homme âgé de 29ans. Il est marié å une revendeuse . Il a 02 enfants dont 01 à l’école. Le premier  à 05ans et le dernier 02ans.
Kodzo travaille comme producteur et vendeur de fourneaux à gaz depuis 2010. Il vend seul à la maison à toutes personnes et sa difficulté principale est la mévente. 
Kodzo a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter du matériel pour fabriquer des fourneaux à gaz. Il veut subvenir aux besoins du ménage, produire en quantité les fourneaux et avoir une boutique. Il veut aussi améliorer les conditions de vie de la famille.
texts.en:
Kodzo is a 29-year-old man who is married to a retailer. He has two children, one of whom is in school. The first child is 5 years old, and the last is 2. Kodzo has been working as a producer and seller of gas stoves since 2010. He sells alone out of his house to all comers. His main difficulty is a drop in sales. 

Kodzo has requested his first loan from WAGES to buy some material for making gas stoves. He wants to support his home, produce stoves in quantity, and have a store. He also wants to improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy tools for making stoves

loans.name: Isokhon

texts.ru: Исохон женат и на воспитании имеет четверых детей. Его жена занимается домохозяйством. Он очень трудолюбивый, добрый и целеустремленный человек, который более 6 лет занимается предоставлением услуг такси, а также занимается купле- продажей крупного рогатого скота. Имеет хорошие условия для развития своего бизнеса, а также имеет богатый опыт в этой сфере. Исохон запрашивает займ для ремонта своего автомобиля и покупки скота. Исохон надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Isokhon is married and has four children.  His wife is involved in household work.  He is a very hardworking, kind and goal-oriented person, who has been involved in providing a taxi service for over six years and is also involved in buying and selling cattle.  Isokhon has good conditions for developing his business and also has a rich experience in this sphere.  Isokhon is requesting this loan to repair his car and buy cattle.  He relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to repair his car and buy cattle

loans.name: Efraín

texts.es: Efraín tiene 64 años de edad y habita junto con su esposa e hijos en casa de su propiedad. Él se dedica a la agricultura desde hace mucho tiempo. Cultiva principalmente maíz, frijoles y maicillos. Cada año alquila 4 manzanas de tierra para poder sembrar las semillas que luego se convertirán en la cosecha que le permitirán llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar.  De esta forma se gana la vida y da a su familia lo necesario. Su familia es su principal fuente de inspiración para seguir trabajando y luchando por darles una calidad de vida diferente. Muchas personas dan buenas referencias de él ya que es un hombre responsable trabajador y muy justo. Cada año repite la misma dinámica, siembra, saca la cosecha y luego la pone a la venta para sacar un poco de ingresos que  le permitan cubrir otras necesidades en su hogar.  Para continuar con su negocio ha decidido solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en el alquiler de tierra y comprar insumos agrícolas. Confía en Dios todo poderoso que logrará su objetivo y podrá continuar satisfaciendo las necesidades básicas de su amada familia.
texts.en: Efraín is 64 years old. He lives together with his wife and children in a house that he owns. He has worked in agriculture for a long time. He mainly grows corn, beans and millet. Each year, he rents 4 blocks of land so that he can plant the seeds which will later become the harvest, allowing him to provide his household's daily bread. In this way, he earns a living and gives his family what they need. His family is his main source of inspiration to keep working and striving to give them a different quality of life. Many people give good references for him, since he is a responsible, hard-working and very fair man. Each year, the same cycle repeats itself: planting, reaping the harvest and later offering it for sale to earn a little income so he can cover other necessities in his household. To continue with his business, he has decided to request this loan from INTEGRAL to invest in renting land and buying agricultural supplies. He says that he trusts in Almighty God that he will achieve his objective and be able to continue satisfying his beloved family's basic needs.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and rent land for planting.

loans.name: Filimon

texts.es: Filimón es un emprendedor que creó su propia herramienta de trabajo para generar ingresos para la familia y sufragar los gastos del hogar  y brindarle a su familia lo necesario. El emprendedor Filimón ya ha venido trabajando con Fundación León 2000, en crédito durante los ciclos que ha trabajado ha demostrado ser una persona responsable y con deseos de superación, actualmente está solicitando financiamiento para comprar materiales necesarios para el negocio y seguir brindando los servicios de soldadura y radio técnico.
texts.en:
Filimón is an entrepreneur who made his own work tools to make income for his family and to manage household expenses and to give his family what they need. Filimón the entrepreneur has already worked with Fundación León 2000. When he has worked during the loan cycles he has shown that he is a responsible person with the desire to get ahead. 

Right now he is asking for financing to buy the necessary materials for his business and to keep offering his services as a welder and radio technician.

loans.use: to buy the necessary materials for his business and to keep offering his services as a welder and radio technician.

loans.name: Shuhrat

texts.ru: Шухрат-молодой семьянин,имеет  детей и вместе с женой Холисхон трудятся и содержат семью.Жена Шухрата работала за пределами города на заработках,но из-за того,что здоровье Шухрата не позволяла поехать с женой на заработки,он остался дома и присматривал за детьми.Его профессия очень востребована в его селении:он сварщик и производит металлические изделия на заказ и на продажу.Он накопляя свои сбережения несколько лет назад,купил несколько голов мелкого скота и с тех пор непрерывно пасет скот и этим доходом наполняет семейный бюджет.На полученный кредит он купил одного бычка и доходы от крупного скота тоже оказались хорошими.Теперь он планирует закупить по одному крупному скоту и откармливать его до  тех пор,пока не будут   крупные расходы,ведь  он уже несколько раз продавал свой скот и покрывал свои расходы на семейные нужды.
texts.en: Shuhrat is a young family man; he has children and works together with his wife, Holiskhon, to support the family.  Shuhrat's wife used to work outside the city limits, but because Shuhrat's health did not allow him to come with his wife, he remained at home and watched after the children.  Shuhrat's profession is in high demand in his village; he is a welder and makes metal goods to-order and for sale.  He used his savings to buy several heads of small livestock a few years ago and has been consistently taking this livestock to a pasture since then and using this income to add to the family's budget.  He used a loan to buy one bull, and the earning from cattle also turned out to be good.  Now, Shuhrat plans to buy another cow and fatten it up until he has large expenses because he had already sold his livestock several times and covered his expenses for family needs.

loans.use: to buy a cow

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to make the initial payment on at moto-taxi for his son.

loans.name: Faizigul

texts.ru: Файзигул умная и талантливая женщина. Она разведена и на воспитании имеет троих детей. Более 3-х лет Файзигул занимается предоставлением услуг швеи. Она является хорошим специалистом. У неё много постоянных клиентов и получает хороший доход от этого бизнеса. Отличительная черта данного бизнеса включается в том, что у нее хороший опыт работы и жители этого региона нуждаются в услуге швеи. Кроме этого она занимается другим видом бизнеса купле продажей продуктов питания. В бизнесе помогает дочка. Она запрашивает займ для покупки тканей, ниток, а также продуктов питания для своего магазина.
texts.en: Faizigul is a smart and talented woman. She is divorced and is raising three children. Faizigul has been providing tailoring services for more than three years. She is a professional. She has many regular customers and she receives a good income from this business. The perfect aspect of this business is that she has a good experience in this type of work and the residents of this region show a need in the tailoring services. Besides that Faizigul also does another business selling food. Her daughter helps her in this business. Faizigul is asking for a loan to buy fabrics, threads and also food for her store.

loans.use: to purchase fabrics, threads and food for her store.

loans.name: Sonia Leticia

texts.es: Sonia Leticia de treinta y cuatro años de edad vive  junto a sus tres hijos, ella posee una panadería donde vende toda clase de pan salado y dulce, como quesadillas, cachitos, salpores, pañuelos entre otros es el mejor pan de la zona pues siempre está recién horneado, hecho con material de primera calidad y lo comercian a precio accesible además el servicio es único; Sonia es una mujer emprendedora, muy activa y siempre aprovechando oportunidades que se le presentan, piensa que una sensación de continuo desarrollo, es una maravillosa fuente de motivación y confianza para ti, quiere tener esa sensación es por eso que se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar harina por mayor, azúcar, levadura, dulce, leche etc. Sonia Leticia tiene la esperanza que así podrá regalarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Sonia Leticia, who is 34 years old, lives with her three children. She has a bakery where she sells all kinds of savory and sweet breads, like quesadillas, croissants, sugar cookies, wraps, and others. It is the best bread in the area, since it is always freshly baked, made with quality ingredients, and sold at reasonable prices. On top of that, the service is outstanding.

Sonia is an enterprising, very active woman who always takes advantage of the opportunities given to her. She thinks that the feeling of continual growth is a wonderful source of motivation and confidence for her. She wants to have this feeling, and that is why she decided to ask for a loan from INTEGRAL which would allow her to buy wholesale flour, sugar, yeast, sweets, milk, etc. 

Sonia Leticia hopes that in this way she will be able to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy wholesale flour, sugar, yeast, sweets, milk, etc.

loans.name: Bonifacio

texts.es: Bonifacio de 63 años de edad es conocido en su lugar como  pancho, el es de la comarca las Cañitas- Teustepe,municipio de Boaco, casado,  tiene 4 hijos los cuales todos están casados. Bonifacio empezó sus actividades agrícolas a los 10 años d edad al lado de su papa, a los 17 años de edad se caso y actualmente  producto de su esfuerzo, sudor  y arduo trabajo diario ahora cuenta con sus tierras y el ganado,  se dedica a la siembra de frijol, maíz y trigo que una ves cosechado lo vende ya sea en su comarca o lo vende en Managua.  El necesita el crédito para comprar los insumos, pagar  mano de obra y preparar el terreno para la siembra de maíz y frijol. El préstamo le ayudara ya que podrá sacar su cosecha adelante. Uno de sus planes es que una vez cancelado el crédito quiere comprar  cerdos para criar y vender.
texts.en:
63-year-old Bonifacio is known in his town as "Pancho." He is from the region of las Cañitas-Teustepe, a borough of Boaco. He is married with four children who are all married.

Bonifiacio began doing agricultural work at ten years old at his father's side. At 17, he got married. Right now he considers the product of his sweat, hard work, and daily effort to be his lands and cattle. He makes a living planting beans, corn, and wheat, which he sells after harvesting, either in his area or in Managua. He needs this loan to buy agricultural inputs, pay the workers, and prepare the land for the planting of corn and beans. 

The loan will help him to be able to reap his harvest early. One of his plans is that, after paying off the loan, he wants to buy pigs to raise and sell.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs, pay the workers, and prepare the land for the planting of corn and beans.

loans.name: Aiysultan

texts.ru:
Айсултан 36 лет, замужем, имеет 2 детей. В поисках дохода для своей семьи, в 1999 года Айсултан начала свой бизнес в животноводстве со стартовой суммы 4,000 сом (KGS). В настоящее время в хозяйстве Айсултан имеется  4 дойных коров, приносящее ежемесячную прибыль с продажи молока и молочных продуктов в сумме 3,000 сом (KGS). Животноводство является семейным бизнесом, мать Айсултан также активно занимается разведением скота,  получив кредит с поддержкой инвесторов Кива в конце прошлого года ( please find http://www.kiva.org/lend?partner_id=171&status=All&sortBy=Most+Recent#/?&partner_id=171&status=All&sortBy=newest&queryString=sapiyakhan ). 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Айсултан обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS)  на закуп дополнительных голов скота.  Доходы от кредита Айсултан планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства.
texts.en: Aiysultan is 36 years old, married and has two children.  In search of a source of income for her family, she started her own business in animal husbandry in 1999 with an initial sum of 4,000 som (KGS).  Animal husbandry is the family business; Aiysultan's mother is also actively involved in breeding livestock, having obtained a loan with the support of Kiva investors at the end of last year (please see http://www.kiva.org/lend?partner_id=171&status=All&sortBy=Most+Recent#/?&partner_id=171&status=All&sortBy=newest&queryString=sapiyakhan).  In order to further develop her business, Aiysultan requested a loan in the amount of 100,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy additional heads of livestock.  She plans to invest the earnings from the loan into expanding her business further.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Jose Manuel

texts.es:
Jose es un joven de 22 años, que ha aprendido a luchar y salir adelante junto a su madre, a la cuál ama y está dispuesto a todo por ella, con el fin de hacerla feliz.

Jose actualmente labora como chofer de moto taxi,  el debe levantarse diariamente muy temprano con el fin de encontrar a tiempo en sus clientes, en las zonas más concurridas, debido a que diariamente se transportan camino al colegio o el trabajo. Pero, esta no es la única actividad que Jose realiza si no que también se dedica a la costura a mano junto a su mamá ya que siempre tiene muchas prendas que cocer.  

Con un poco de apoyo, Jose desea poder facilitarle el trabajo a su mamá y es por eso que desea poder comprar una máquina industrial de cocer, con esta nueva máquina, él sabe que su mamá ya no tendrá que estar todo el día cociendo, podrá facilitarle el trabajo y permitirle atender a mucho más clientes en menos tiempo. Jose considera a su madre como su fuente de motivación e inspiración, el sabe que los ingresos que tiene junto a su madre mejorarán, ya que el podrá pasar más tiempo en la moto y su madre tendrá un trabajo más ligero. El desea poder, en algunos meses, comprarse una moto taxi nueva, de esta manera sus ingresos se incrementarán y podrá vivir mucho mejor.
texts.en:
José, 22, is a young man who has learned to fight and get ahead together with his mother, whom he loves and for whom he is ready to do everything to make her happy.

Currently José works as a motorcycle taxi driver.  He has to get up very early every day with the goal of finding his customers on time in the busiest areas, because they are driven to school or to work.  But this is not the only job José does; he also works sewing by hand with his mother, because she always has a lot of garments to sew.

With a little bit of help, José wants to be able to make his mother's work easier for her.  This is why he wants to be able to buy an industrial sewing machine.  José knows that with this new machine his mother no longer will need to be sewing all day.  He will be able to make her work easier for her and allow her to serve many more customers in less time.

José considers his mother to be his source of motivation and inspiration.  He knows that the income he has with his mother will improve because he will be able to spend more time on the motorcycle and his mother will have a lighter job.  He wants to be able to buy himself a new motorcycle taxi in a few months.  In this way his income will increase and he will be able to live much better.

loans.use: to buy an industrial sewing machine.

loans.name: Rosie

texts.en:
Rosie is from Libag Sur. She is married to Felipe, a tricycle driver in their village. To add to her spouse's income, Rosie sells grocery items to her neighborhood from her house. She has been doing this for 10 years and was happy to acquire just enough income for daily meals and electric bills. 

Rosie wants to increase her income, so she is asking for a loan of of 14,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) to buy instant noodles, shampoo, canned goods, bread, and eggs for resale. She would like to meet all her customers' demands at the affordable prices she offers. Someday she hopes to construct a more convenient stall to stock more grocery items and keep offering friendly service to her customers. This will also enable her to achieve financial stability someday.

loans.use: to buy instant noodles, shampoo, canned goods, bread, and eggs for resale.

loans.name: Mirzojon

texts.ru: Mирзочон-51летний мужчина,с высшим медицинским образованием.Отец 4х детей,работает на районной больнице врачом терапевтом.У него много своих клиентов,так как в селах он очень востребован и таких кадров там не очень много.Дополнительным доходом семьи является откорм коз и овец и держит свой скот у себя дома.В горах сейчас много травы и начинается сезон в животноводстве,он решил взять небольшой кредит и закупить еще несколько голов.По рекомендации своих соседей он обратился к нам и наши условия понравились ему.На полученный кредит он хочет купит овец или ангорских коз.
texts.en: Mirzojon is a 51 year-old man, who has a higher medical education.  He is a father of four children, works at the district hospital as a therapist.  He has many patients because he is in high demand in the villages due to the fact that there are not many such professionals there.  The family's additional income comes from fattening up goats and sheep that Mirzojon keeps at home.  There is a lot grass in the mountains now, and the animal husbandry season is starting; thus, he decided to obtain a small loan and buy several heads of livestock.  Based on his neighbors' advice, he came to us and liked our terms.  Mirzojon wants to use this loan to buy sheep or angora goats.

loans.use: to buy sheep or goats

loans.name: Karim

texts.ru: Карим женат, имеет двоих детей. Первому 5  лет а второму 2 годика. Жена домохозяйка и присматривает за детьми. Карим начинал свой бизнес 2 года назад с продажи постельного белья, постепенно расширяя бизнес, добавил новый ассортимент товара: полотенца, покрывала и подушки. Его бизнес прибыльный и у данного бизнеса нету сезонности. Карим запрашивает займ для покупки товара с целью увлечения оборотного капитала. Лето период свадеб и потребность на данные товары возрастает. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту. Cпасибо!
texts.en: Karim is married and has two children, the first of whom is five years old and the second is two years old.  His wife is a homemaker and watches after the children.  Karim started his business two years ago with the sales of bedding, then gradually expanded his business by adding new merchandise selection: towels, blankets and pillows.  His business is profitable and is not seasonal.  Karim is requesting this loan to buy merchandise in order to increase his working capital.  Summer is the period of weddings, and the demand for this merchandise increases.  He relies on your help and kindness.  Thank you!

loans.use: to buy new merchandise

loans.name: Manuel De Jesús

texts.es: Manuel de Jesús de 48 años de edad, habita en casa propia junto con su familia. Él es un hombre muy trabajador y lleno de metas. El señor Manuel se dedica al cultivo de los principales granos básicos desde hace mucho tiempo. Tiene mucha experiencia en el cultivo de maíz y frijoles. Esta actividad la repite cada año ya que es su principal fuente de ingresos. Por lo anterior ha tomado la decisión de acercarse a esta institución, INTEGRAL, para solicitar este préstamo que le permita cubrir los gastos de los principales insumos agrícolas para este año. Principalmente el crédito lo necesita para comprar: semillas, venenos para las plagas, abonos y demás insumos necesarios para lograr una buena cosecha. Es un hombre muy comprometido en su trabajo y confía que con la ayuda de Dios y su esfuerzo podrá obtener una buena cosecha que le permita seguir dando lo necesario a su familia.
texts.en:
Manuel de Jesús is 48 years old and lives in his own house with his family.  He is a hard-working man, and full of goals.  Manuel has worked in farming the main basic grains since a long time ago.  He has a lot of experience in the cultivation of corn and beans.  He repeats this activity every year, now that it is his primary source of income.  

Due to the above-mentioned, he has made the decision to approach this institution, INTEGRAL, to request this loan that permits him to cover the expenses of the main agricultural supplies for this year.  He mainly needs the loan to buy: seeds, poison for pests, fertilizers and the rest of the supplies necessary to attain a good harvest.  He is a man that is very involved in his work and he trusts that with God's help and his effort he can obtain a good harvest that will permit him to continue giving what is necessary to his family.

loans.use: to buy seeds, poison for pests, fertilizers, etc.

loans.name: Komil

texts.ru: Комил женат и на воспитании имеет двоих детей. Сын родился в 2012 году, а дочка родилась в 2010 года. Жена является учительницей средней школы, преподает таджикский язык и  литературу. Комил работает в таджикской алюминиевой компании- электриком. Он в этой сфере работает уже более 37 лет. В связи большими осадками в этом году от сырости  стены дома требуют ремонта. Для этого он обратился  в «ИМОН Интернешнл» за помощью. Комил запрашивает займ для ремонта своего дома. Он использует займ для покупки цемента, камней, песка, грунта и кирпича. Комил надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Komil is married and has two children.  His son was born in 2012, and the daughter was born in 2010.  Komil's wife is a teacher at a secondary school; she teaches Tajik language and literature.  Komil works as an electrician at a Tajik aluminum company.  He has been working in this area for many years.  Due to a lot of rain this year, the walls of his house got saturated and need to be repaired.  This is why Komil came to "IMON International" for help.  Komil is requesting this loan to repair his house.  He will use the loan to buy cement, stones, sand, gravel and bricks.  Komil relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to repair his house

loans.name: Security Group

texts.en:
Zubeda, who is in her mid 40s, is married with five children, two of whom are still in school and three of whom are grown-ups. Zubeda has been running several small businesses. She has been selling clothes door-to-door and selling local ice cream and ice cubes for six years. She works from 10:00 a.m. to 12 noon (for two hours only) and is able to make a small monthly profit.

This will be her 1st loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She wants to use the loan to buy more clothes, local ice cream, and ice cubes for resale.  Her dream is to be able to build her own house one day.

She will share this loan with her loan group, "Security," which has a total of 15 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back their loans.

loans.use: to buy more clothes, local ice cream, and ice cubes.

loans.name: Sokhorn

texts.en:
Sokhorn, 37, is married and resides with her husband and two children in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She has been selling vegetables for more than ten years, earning approximately 5 U.S. dollars (USD) per day. Her husband runs a public-transportation service (motor taxi) and also earns about 5 USD per day.

Sokhorn is requesting a loan of 1000 USD to purchase a threshing machine for rental. This purchase will enable her to improve her family's livelihood by generating more income to support the family. In the future, Sokhorn would like to rebuild her present house to make it stronger so she can provide convenient living conditions for the family. She would also like to help her children get a bachelor’s degree.

loans.use: to purchase a threshing machine for rental

loans.name: Anonymous Group

texts.fr: La cliente, Présidente et promoteur du groupe de crédit  Cherubin, Femme  dynamique, entrepreneur expérimentée, âgée de 31 ans. Elle est  vendeuse de denrées alimentaires. Son mari est  quincaillier. Elle a commencé son business en s’entraidant avec son mari. Plus tard, elle constitua son capital et trouva son autonomie. Il ya 4 mois qu’elle  fut informée de micro crédit qu’octroi l’IMF Hekima, immédiatement, elle a pris de contact utile avec les responsables de la dite organisation. Ainsi, elle bénéficia son premier crédit de 50$ pour renforcer  ses affaires. Ce nouveau crédit doit lui servir  de s’approvisionner avec  150 kg de farine de manioc, les sels, les tomates, etc.  En plus, elle souhaite  voir ses enfants grandir. La cliente remercie Hekima pour  les actions d’autonomisation de pauvres femmes exclues de banque classique. Il sied de signaler que certaines clientes portent leurs bébés
texts.en:
This client is the president and promoter of the loan group Cherubin. An energetic woman and experienced entrepreneur, she is 31 years old and a food seller. Her husband deals in hardware. She started her business with her husband's help. Later on, she built up her own capital and discovered self-sufficiency. 

Four months ago, she was informed about microloans, which the microfinance institution Hekima awards. Right away, she contacted the officials of the aforementioned organization with useful results.

Thus, she benefited from her first loan of $50 for bolstering her business. This new loan must serve to supply her with 150 kg of cassava flour, salt, tomatoes, etc. In addition, she wishes to see her children grown up. 

This client thanks Hekima for its actions helping poor women excluded from traditional banks to become autonomous. 

It is appropriate to indicate that come of the clients are carrying their babies.

loans.use: to pay for 150 kg of cassava flour, salt, tomatoes, etc.

loans.name: Byamba

texts.en:
Borrower Byamba is a 54-year-old widow who has two daughters. She lives with her daughters in the outer ger district, which lacks the basic infrastructure of Ulaanbaatar City. She supports her family by operating a clothing-sale business at the second-largest outdoor market of the city.

Byamba is requesting a loan of 1,000,000 Mongolian tugriks (MNT) to purchase clothes to sell for this spring season. She is a trusted client of Transcapital Co. Ltd.

loans.use: to purchase more clothes for resale

loans.name: Lour

texts.en: Lour, 49, is married and resides with her husband and eight children in Kampong Chnang Province, Cambodia. She and her husband have been involved in an agricultural business for over twenty years. They have extensive experience and are successful in their career. They are involved in growing rice and fattening up cattle. They earn approximately USD 3 per day. Five of her children are employed in a garment factory. They earn about USD 18 per day. Due to the difficulty in pumping water into her rice field, Lour is requesting a loan of USD 1,500 to purchase a water pump. This purchase would enable her to reduce the operating costs in her farming work and get a higher yield. In the future, she would like to expand her agricultural business and help her children get bachelor's degrees. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it bigger and stronger to provide convenient living conditions for the family.

loans.use: to purchase a water pump

loans.name: Alice

texts.en:
Alice is 41 and is married with six children, aged between 3 and 18 years old. She sells clothes and has been in this business for five years.

Alice has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company in order to purchase more clothes to sell. With any profits, she will be able to save for her future and reinvest in her business.

loans.use: To purchase more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Sreng

texts.en:
Sreng, 30, is a resident from Prey Chor district, Kompong Cham province. She lives with her husband and two school-aged children. She has devoted herself to an agricultural business, cultivating rice crops on her own farmland. Her husband is supportive in helping her all the way whether she works in or outdoors. Besides rice husbandry, this couple is involved in another type of business, which is to make and sell small mills (mortar made of hard wood) for  a profit. 

In order to sustain the second business of the family, Sreng is taking out a loan to purchase raw stones for the mill making business. This loan will improve her household income. With the generated profit, Sreng will support her children’s education.

loans.use: to purchase raw stones for her mill making business.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en: Joseph is a 39-year-old married gentleman with 7 children. He deals in a "first-hand" (new) clothes business which he has run for a period of 6 years. He started in agriculture, then local brewing, and finally the clothing business. He says that inadequate capital and high taxes are affecting the business. Joseph would like to educate his children and expand his business to new markets. He wants a loan to buy clothes for sale during the Easter season.

loans.use: to buy clothes for sale during the Easter season.

loans.name: Maimouna

texts.fr:
Madame Maimouna est une dame âgée de 43 ans, mariée et mère de famille. Elle s’active dans le commerce depuis plus de 30 ans maintenant, car elle a démarré dès l’âge très jeune.
Elle est à son 3ème crédit à l’IMCEC et aimerait avoir un renouvellement pour  acheter de la marchandise et satisfaire sa clientèle. Avec le crédit, elle va se procurer des tissus, des chaussures et des bijoux qu’elle va revendre dans le voisinage.
Maimouna n’a pas de charges et travaille pour diversifier les produits et services. Et cela, elle le fait pour  vivre elle et son foyer dans le confort.
texts.en:
Maimouna is a 43-year-old woman who is married and has a family.  She has been involved in retail business for more than thirty years already, having started at a very young age.

This is her third loan with UIMCEC and she is counting on this renewed loan to buy some goods and to meet the needs of her customers.  With her loan, she will buy fabrics, shoes and jewelry, which she will resell in her neighborhood.

Maimouna has no expenses and works in order to diversify products and services.  Her goal is to provide comfortable living conditions to her family.

loans.use: to buy shoes, fabrics and jewelry for resale.

loans.name: Claudio

texts.en: Claudio is a 38-year-old gentleman who is married with 4 children. He has a retail business that he has run for 1 year. He started in agriculture, then went into the boda boda (bicycle taxi) and produce businesses, and finally got the capital to start a retail business. He says inadequate capital is affecting the business and wants a loan to buy sugar, salt, and baking powder for resale. Claudio would like to educate his children, expand his business to new markets, and buy land for growing crops.

loans.use: to buy sugar, salt, and baking powder for resale.

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en: Juliet is a 26-year-old lady who has a stationery business. She started the business with capital from her father and has operated it for 2 years. She faces problems of inadequate capital to facilitate the business and customers not paying on time. She wants a loan to buy books, pens, and reams of paper for resale. She would like mostly to build a permanent home. She would also like to move her business to a more permanent location.

loans.use: to buy books, pens, and reams of paper for resale.

loans.name: Yoronimu

texts.en: Yoronimu is a 40-year-old resident of Kagadi. He has been in the transport business for 2 years. He says he started by driving the neighbors’ taxi, then decided to buy it at a reduced price. His business is affected by high fuel costs and taxes. He wants a loan to buy tires for his vehicle. He would like to work hard to ensure that his children are educated and would like to buy land for growing crops.

loans.use: to buy tires for his vehicle.

loans.name: Kennedy

texts.en: Kennedy is 21 years old and does carpentry to earn a living. He has been in the business for 3 years and has employed one person. He describes his business environment as good because there is limited competition. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to improve his living standards and hopes to be financially stable in the future. He has applied for a loan of 9,000 Kenyan shillings (KES) to buy timber for making furniture.

loans.use: to buy timber for making furniture

loans.name: Batjantsan

texts.en: Batjantsan is a 47-year-old married man who lives with his family in an outer ger (Mongolian housing tent) district that lacks basic infrastructure in Ulaanbaatar city, Mongolia. He is a security man at a local high school. Since last year, he has managed to build a new house and he wants to finish it this spring. Therefore, he is requesting a 800,000 Mongolian Tugriks (MNT) loan to purchase some necessary construction materials.

loans.use: to purchase housing materials.

loans.name: Francine Semanou

texts.fr: Francine Semanou est mariée et sans enfant. Elle n'a personne à charge. Elle vend les articles de mercerie, ustensiles de cuisine et autres depuis cinq ans. Francine Semanou s'approvisionne dans l'un des marchés de la place. Elle s'entretient avec une clientèle variée. Francine Semanou veut augmenter son stock, elle désire également participer à la charge familiale avec ses économies.
texts.en:
Francine Semanou is married and does not have any children.  She has no dependent.  She has been selling sewing supplies, kitchen utensils, and other goods for five years.  She buys her merchandise at one of the local markets and has a diverse customer base.  

Francine Semanou wants to increase her stock of goods and to contribute to family expenses using her savings.

loans.use: to buy 30 items for sewing and one large bag of used clothing in bulk.

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en:
Stephen is 40 years old and married with four children. He does a motorcycle-transport business to earn a living. He has been in the business for three years and describes his business environment as competitive because many people do the same business. To earn extra income, he does masonry. 

Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to educate his children and hopes to expand his business in the future. He has applied for a 20,000 Kenya Shillings loan to buy a motorbike.

loans.use: To buy a motorbike.

loans.name: Moustapha

texts.fr:
L’emprunteur s’appelle Moustapha, il loge à environ 22 km de la ville principale, un petit village qui tend vers la popularité grâce à son marché de légumes. Moustapha est un agriculteur depuis 20 ans. Il est marié et père de 4 enfants. Il est à son 3ème crédit à l’IMCEC et aimerait renouveler  pour acheter des semences .Et pour cela, il a besoin de 500000F CFA pour pouvoir acheter 7 pots de semences de choux, 30 sacs de fumier, 8 litres de gasoil. 
Avec les bénéfices de son exploitation il réussi à entretenir sa femme et ses enfants, mais aussi sa maman. Il aimerait agrandir son exploitation et son fond de roulement dans l’avenir afin de mieux gérer l’exploitation.
texts.en:
Moustapha lives about 22 kilometers from the main town in a small village that tends to attract attention thanks to its vegetable market.  Moustapha has been a farmer for 20 years.  He is married and the father of four children.  This will be his third loan via IMCEC with which he would like to purchase seeds.  To this end, he will need 500,000F CFA for the purchase of 7 pots of cabbage seeds, 30 sacks of manure, and 8 liters of fuel.

With the profits of his work, he is able to take care of his wife and children as well as his mother.  He would like to expand his operation and woking capital in the future in order to better manage his business.

loans.use: to purchase cabbage seeds, manure, and fuel for his farming operations.

loans.name: Anthony

texts.en:
Anthony is a 39-year-old resident of Kagadi who has eight children and operates a business selling clothes. He started by practicing agriculture, then got capital for the current business, now operating for eight years. Price fluctuations and high fuel and transport costs are factors affecting his operations. He would like to educate his children, and for the business, he would like to expand to new markets. 

Anthony wants a loan to buy more clothes during the Easter season for sale.

loans.use: to buy more clothes during the Easter season for sale.

loans.name: Simon

texts.en:
Simon is 34 years old and married with two children. He runs a retail shop to earn a living. He has been in the business for three years and describes his business environment as favorable because there is limited competition. To earn extra income, he does maize farming. 

Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to grow his business and hopes to expand his business in the future. He has applied for 50,000 Kenya Shillings to buy sugar, rice, cooking oil and maize flour to sell.

loans.use: To buy sugar, rice, cooking oil and maize flour to sell.

loans.name: Marhabo

texts.ru: Мархабо замужем и на воспитании имеет одну дочку. Супруг работает в Российской Федерации. Мархабо очень трудолюбивая и добрая женщина. Более 5 лет  она работает продавцом в продуктовом магазине. Она мечтает о том, чтобы создать уют и комфорт в своем доме, и с этой целью запрашивает займ в размере 4000 Сомони для покупки строительных материалов для ремонта своего дома. Она надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en: Marhabo is married and she is raising one daughter. Her husband works in the Russian Federation. Marhabo is a very hardworking and kind woman. She has been working as a salesperson in a grocery store for more than five years.  Her dream is to make her house comfortable, and to this end, she is requesting a loan of 4,000 somoni for the purchase of building materials to repair her house.  She looks forward to your help and mercy.

loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: Mirzohamid

texts.ru: Мирохамид трудолюбивый и добросовестный семьянин. Он женат и на воспитании имеет троих детей. Более 10 лет Мирзохамид занимается выращиванием сельхозпродуктов. Он начинал свой бизнес с выращивания пшеницы.  Мирзохамид запрашивает займ в размере 10000 Сомони для покупки минеральных удобрений для обработки земли. Мирзохамид надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
