She has been a member of one of the branches of the U-IMCEC in the village where she lives since September 2004. She has already paid back nine previous loans. She is seeking a loan of 500,000 frs to pay for an order of goods that she placed.

The profitability of her retail business from the very beginning has helped her acquire household furniture and also satisfy her own needs as well as those of her brothers and sisters.

loans.use: to pay for an order of goods

loans.name: Sarangerel

texts.en:
Mrs. Sarangerel, 48, is a water specialist and she has a small cattle farm in her home. She lives with her husband in Darkhan, the second largest city in Mongolia. They have a son who recently moved out of his parents' house. She has been running her cattle farm since 2005 and currently it has 15 cows in all. 

Her son Mashbayar, 18, studies in high school. He really wants to assist his parents to improve their family's living standard. Recently he purchased a turbine engine car which completely uses natural gas as fuel  to use as a taxi around the city when he is not busy with lessons. He thinks it is a good way to improve his and his family's financial state. Also he believes that the use of a turbine engine /natural gas engine/ car will be environmentally friendly and is a natural oriented idea.  

Last month the car's engine broke down.  Therefore he needs MNT 3,000,000 to purchase a new turbine engine and make some repairs on their green car.

loans.use: To purchase a new turbine engine and make some repairs on their green car.

loans.name: Gülay's Group

texts.en:
Gülay is a 40-year-old divorced woman who has 2 children. Following an unsuccessful marriage, she had to take care of herself and the 2 little ones without any support from her family. After many unsuccessful attempts to land a job, Gülay decided to start her own business. She started her venture with a very small budget. Initially, she bought her goods from local wholesalers in Eskisehir because her operations were small and she did not have the resources to buy from other cities with lower prices. 

She has sharpened her business skills over time, and she believes that commitment and persistence are keys to success. Her numerous attempts to rent a space at the local market allowed her to expand her business, and she even bought a vehicle and learned how to drive to transport her goods between local markets. She took care of her children with the income from her business. 

Gülay is a hardworking self-starter, and an intelligent woman. She uses the funds from Maya to support the capital requirements of her business during low seasons. She is thankful to Maya for the support. Her friends from local markets will also use funds from Maya for their businesses. This is Gulay's first loan through Kiva.

Translated from Turkish by Maya Volunteers

Gülay ,1972 Eskişehir doğumlu.Zor bir evliliğin ardından hayatına tek başına devam etmek zorunda kalmış ve 2 çocuğu var.Eşiyle ayrıldıktan sonra çalışmak zorunda ve çocuklarına bakmak zorunda olan Gülay Hanım ailesine yük olmayı asla düşünmemiş.Kendi ayaklarının üzerinde durup çocukları için çalışmak zorundaymış çünkü.Yapabileceği bütün iş başvurularını yapmış nerdeyse fakat bir sonuç alamayınca neden kendi işimi kendim yapmıyorum deyip bunu en iyi ticaretle yapabileceğini düşünmüş.O kadar küçük bir rakamla başlamış ki ticarete şu an onun için bu başlangıç rakamı güzel bir anı.Önceleri sadece Eskişehir toptancılarından getirdiği pijama ve iç çamaşırlarını satmaya başlamış çünkü şehir dışına gidip mal almak onun için bir lüksmüş fakat kısa zamanda bu işin ustası olmayı başarmış.İnsan dört elle sarılırsa neler yapamaz diyen Gülay Hanım sonrasında bir semt pazarından yer alabilmek için günlerce uğraşmış ve sonunda onuda başarmış,tezgahlar bir iki derken şu an eskişehir çeşitli pazarlarında tezgahları var ve hatta bu iş için bir araç bile alıp onu kullanmayı öğrenmiş.Çocuklarını yaptığı işle büyüten Gülay Hanım evin hem annesi hem de babası.Çalışkan ,azimli,zeki bir kadın .halen yaptığı işte dönem dönem özellikle kış aylarında satışın azaldığı günlerde ve yazın mal getirmek için sermaya sıkıntısı çektiği dönemlerde maya sayesinde bu sıkıntısını gidererek işini devam ettiriyor.Kendisi gibi pazarcı arkadaşları ile kullandığı maya kredisi için Maya’ya teşekkür ettiğinide özellikle dile getiriyor.

loans.use: to buy more goods.

loans.name: Rodolfo Alberto

texts.es:
Rodolfo es un hombre muy trabajador, vive junto a su esposa y su hijo de 3 añitos al que quiere mucho aunque a veces le saca canas verdes por lo travieso que es, pero lo convence con su ternura y alegría, su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de Camana, conocida por su riquísimo chupe de camarones, sus hermosas playas y su agricultura en especial por el cultivo de Arroz, considerado uno de los mejores del mundo, asimismo en esta ciudad se practica la pesca artesanal el cual da mucho empleo. Cuando dispone de un tiempo libre a Rodolfo le gusta jugar futbol, con sus vecinos y amigos y también le gusta jugar con su pequeño hijito; también le pide a su esposa que le prepara uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo” Arroz con pato”. 

Cada día Rodolfo se levanta muy temprano para salir a trabajar en su negocio como chofer de mototaxi, trabaja alrededor de 12 horas al día y puede atender hasta 70 clientes en el día; el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amable y sobre todo precavido cuando conduce por ello los clientes tienen confianza en el.

Rodolfo está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias al gran apoyo que le han brindado el podrá comprar su seguro contra accidentes de tránsito y realizar un mantenimiento general a su vehículo, lo que le permitirá dar más seguridad a sus clientes y estar más protegido ante cualquier accidente, con ello seguirá trabajando día a día para hacer realidad su gran sueño.” Darle la mejor educación a su hijo y hacerlo feliz”.
texts.en:
Rodolfo is a very hard-working man.  He lives with his wife and the three year old child.  He loves his son very much even though at times "le saca canas verdes" [he gives him green hairs instead of gray hairs] for how mischievous he is.  However, he wins him over with his tenderness and joy.

His house is in the city of Camana. The city is known for its delicious shrimp chowder, its beautiful beaches, and for its agriculture.  It is especially known for it rice crops, which are considered to be one of the best in the world.  In this city fisherman engage in non-industrial fishing, which provides a lot of employment.

In his free time Rodolfo likes to play soccer with his friends and neighbors.  He also likes to play with his young son.  In addition, he asks his wife to make one of his favorite dishes, rice with duck, which is delicious.

Rodolfo gets up very early every day in order to leave for work in his business as a taxi driver.  He works around 12 hours a day, and he can provide service to about 70 customers a day.  He believes that the business is going well for him because he is friendly.  Most importantly, he is cautious when he drives.  That is why his customers have confidence in him.

Rodolfo is very grateful to the Kiva lenders.  Thanks to the great support they have given him, he will be able to buy insurance for traffic accidents.  He will also be able to provide general maintenance to his vehicle.  This will allow him to make his customers safer and better protected during an accident.  He will continue working this way from day to day to make his big dream a reality.  His dream is to give his child the best education and to make him happy.

loans.use: to buy accident insurance and to provide maintenance to his vehicle.

loans.name: Jet Group

texts.en:
Betül, born in 1978 in Istanbul, is the mother of two. Her husband is a laborer at a factory. While Betül lives a very humble life, she has big dreams that she says she has come closer to reaching after encountering Maya. She began working by doing sales from her own house via catalogues for an undergarments and sleepwear company. After traveling from house to house and gathering a particular group of customers, she formed her own group of salespeople and started to make a profit from their sales. She then applied to Maya with the group she formed from her salespeople and took out a loan, which expanded her sales by bringing in more products. As a result, Betül,expanded her own business, and the group members were able to better support their families. Now Betül has realized another of her dreams, thanks to Maya. After noticing that there was no sewing-supply store in her neighborhood, she opened one of her own, not wanting to miss this opportunity. Now she will continue better doing the work she does both at home and as a shop owner from her shop. This is the group's first loan through Kiva.

Translated from Turkish by Maya Volunteers

Betül,  1978 İstanbul doğumlu evli 2 çocuk annesi.Eşi bir fabrikada işçi olarak çalışıyor Betül,çok mütevazi bir hayatı var fakat bunun yanında çokta güzel hayalleri .Maya ile tanıştıktan sonra bu hayallerine biraz daha yaklaştığını dile getire Betül işi ile ilgili sarfettiği aşamaları şöyle antalıyor;kendi evinden bir iç çamaşırı ve pijama firmasının ürünlerinin katalog üzerinden satışını yaparak başladı ev ev gezerek işini yapmaya çalışan Betül belli bir kesim müşterisini sağladıktan sonra birde kendi alt üyelerini oluşturdu ve onların satışından da kar yapmaya başladı.Maya’ya başvuru yaptığında ise kendi alt üyeleriyle oluşturduğu grupla kredisini çekti ve daha fazla ürün getirerek satışlarını büyüttü.Betül hem kendi işlerini ilerletti hem de grup üyelerinin böylelikle ailelerine büyük destek oldular,şimdi ise Betül bir hayalini daha Maya sayesinde gerçekleştirdi.Kendisine ait bir tuhafiye dükkanı açan Betül Hanım oturduğu semte bu tür bir iş yeri olmadığını farkedince bu fırsatı kaçırmak istemedi şimdi hem bir dükkan sahibi hemde  evden yaptığı işi dükkanınından daha iyi bir şekilde yürütücek.

loans.use: to buy more products and inventory for the sewing-supply store

loans.name: Johnan

texts.en: Johnan, a 32-year-old married father of one, has been operating a produce business for three years. He started by selling his harvested maize, and with the money earned began buying from others. Now requesting a loan to buy maize and groundnuts to sell, Johnan says price fluctuations and inadequate capital are his major business challenges. His goals are to educate his child and expand into new markets.

loans.use: to buy maize and groundnuts to sell.

loans.name: Manuel De Jesús

texts.es: Manuel de Jesús, habita en casa de su propiedad junto a sus dos hijos uno de los cuales se encuentra estudiando. Él se dedica a la venta frutas y verduras desde hace muchos años. Tiene muy buenas referencias personales ya que con el tiempo ha sabido ganarse la confianza de sus clientes y de muchas personas que cada día la prefieren más. Él ha luchado desde hace mucho tiempo parar sacar adelante a su familia es decir para darles una calidad de vida diferente ya que viven en condiciones muy humildes y cada día las necesidades son mayores. Su familia es su principal fuente de inspiración la cual lo impulsa a seguir trabajando duramente para llevar el pan de cada día al hogar. Como todo buen emprendedor ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio con el fin abastecerlo y aumentar su oferta de tal forma que esto le permita tener un aumento en las ventas e ingresos que le permitan  mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia. El crédito lo utilizará para comprar frutas y verduras al por mayor. Espera y confía que los resultados serán satisfactorios y podrá alcanzar el sueño de su vida. Cabe mencionar que se encuentra muy agradecido con esta institución ya que en el pasado le brindaron la mano cuando necesito de un préstamo. Espera que así  sea en esta ocasión.
texts.en:
Manuel de Jesús lives in his own house with his two siblings; one of them goes to school.  

Manuel Jesús has been selling fruit and vegetables for many years.  He has very good personal references because, in time, he has known how to gain the confidence of his customers.  More people prefer his business each day.  He has struggled for a long time in order to get his family ahead.  That is to say that he struggles in order to give them a different quality of life.  They now have very humble living conditions, and each day their needs are greater.

His family is his main source of inspiration, which drives him to continue working hard in order to bring home the daily bread.  

As a good entrepreneur, he has made the decision to request this loan from INTEGRAL.  He will invest in his business in order to stock it and increase his supply.  This will allow him to have a better quality of life for himself and for his family.  He will use the loan to buy fruit and vegetables wholesale.

He hopes and trusts that the results will be satisfactory and that he will be able to fulfill the dream of his life.  It should be mentioned that he is very grateful to this institution because in the past they gave him a hand when he needed a loan.  He hopes it will be that way on this occasion.

loans.use: Purchase vegetables & fruits in bulk

location.town: Cojutepeque en el departamento de Cuscatlán

loans.name: Eumeury

texts.fr:
Monsieur Eumeury est un habitué du guichet car il est à son 6ème prêt .Il est mécanicien et s’active aussi  dans la tôlerie .Il possède son propre atelier  au garage. 
Eumeury est marié et père d’un beau petit garçon de 2 ans. C’est d’ailleurs la raison pour laquelle il sollicite ce crédit. En fait son enfant présente une malformation du cœur depuis le bas âge et il devrait être opéré.
Il a comme charges la dépense quotidienne de sa famille et le bien être de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Eumeury is a regular at this branch since he is now on his sixth loan. He's a mechanic and also works with sheet metal. He has his own workshop in his garage.

Eumeury is married and father of a beautiful two-year-old boy. That's actually the reason why he is seeking this loan. His son has had a heart defect since he was very young and needs an operation.

In terms of expenses, he covers his family's everyday expenses and the well-being of his children.

loans.use: to buy prescription drugs and pay the hospital fees for his sick child

loans.name: Mamasodik

texts.ru: Мамасодик проживает в городе Вахдат. Он женат. Ему 45 лет. У него двое детей. Мамасодик предоставляет услугу, он мастер по починке и установке музыкальных инструментов. Кроме того Мамасодик дает в аренду музыкальные инструменты. Этим видом деятельности он занимается девять лет. Кредит берет для приобретения колонок.
texts.en: Mamasodik lives in the town of Vahdat. He is married and 45 years old. He has two children. Masodik provides a service repairing and installing musical instruments. In addition, he rents out instruments. He has been in this business for nine years. He is taking out a loan in order to buy speakers.

loans.use: to buy speakers.

loans.name: Nestor

texts.es: Néstor de 51 años de dad vive en la ciudad de Cartagena con su esposa  y  tiene 9 hijos  en las edades de 19 a 34 años.  Desde hace 18 años Néstor inició su vida de negocios, vendiendo patacones con queso, posteriormente implementó la venta de cocteles de camarón, caracoles, chipichipis, chicharrón, pajarilla etc., su negocio ha estado siempre ha girado alrededor de los alimentos y se ha mantenido gracias a la preparación que de estos hace,  y a que como está ubicado en una esquina de su barrio, es muy conocido. Néstor está muy satisfecho con su trabajo, porque con él ha logrado sacar adelante a sus hijos,  que hoy son mayores de edad y gracias a la Fundación Santo Domingo tiene un historial crediticio,  que inició desde el año pasado  en esta organización. Su credikiva es el segundo financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará mariscos, cervezas y refrescos en general, su inversión será exitosa,  porque está bien posicionado y sus productos rotan rápidamente, lo que se convierte en un desafió cuando de ellos  carece. Su meta es ampliar su negocio y sacar  adelante a su último hijo que tiene 19 años en los estudios superiores especialmente.
texts.en:
Nestor is 51 years of age and lives in the city of Cartagena with his wife and his 9 children, ages 19 to 34. Nestor began his life in business at the age of 18, selling fried bananas with cheese. Later, he began to sell shrimp cocktails, conk, clams, fried pork skins, fried plantain, etc. Nestor's business has always centered on food and he has survived thanks to the manner in which he prepares it. Because he is located on a corner in his barrio, his stall is well known. 

Nestor is very satisfied with his work because it has enabled him to advance his children, who are now adults, and thanks to the Fundacion Santo Domingo, he has established a credit history. He began to work with this organization last year. This 'credikiva' [Kiva loan] will be his 2nd obtained through the Fundacion Mario Santo Domingo. Nestor will use it to buy shellfish, beer, and soft drinks in general. This investment will be successful because he is well positioned and his products turn over rapidly, which becomes a challenge when they disappear. 

Nestor's goal is to expand his business and, especially, to advance his last son, who is 19 years old, with his higher education.

loans.use: purchase shellfish, beer, and soft drinks in general to sell in his stall.

loans.name: Mbene

texts.en:
Mbene is a thirty-year-old married man with two children. He lives in Kasese, Uganda and practices agriculture. His hardship is unpredictable seasonal weather variations and his personal goals are to build a permanent house and educate his children. He has a business goal of starting other income-generating activities. 

He intends to use the loan to buy iron sheets for constructing his residential house.

loans.use: to buy iron sheets for constructing his house.

loans.name: Robert

texts.en:
Robert is a 25-year-old businessman who deals in produce, mainly maize and beans, in Kagadi town. He is has three children and has been in this business for a period of two years. 

He started by growing his own crops, then sold them and got capital to start buying from others. Robert faces a problem of price fluctuation and inflation, which erodes most of the profits. His personal dreams are to educate his children and buy a car and his business dream is to expand his business into new markets. Robert wants a loan to buy maize and beans for resale.

loans.use: to buy maize and beans for resale.

loans.name: Obed

texts.en: Obed is a 28 year old gentleman married who has 4 children. He has a retail shop, which he has run for a period of 2 years. He got capital from savings of his salary as a civil servant and started a retail shop. He says inadequate capital is affecting the business. Obed would like to educate his children and expand his business to new markets. He wants a loan to buy sugar, salt and plastics to sell.

loans.use: to buy sugar, salt and plastics to sell.

loans.name: Kasifa

texts.en: Kasifa used the previous loan to buy rice and sugar to sell. The 38-year-old married woman has four children and lives in Kasese, Uganda. Kasifa has operated a retail shop for six years. Her hardship is still having inadequate capital to purchase stock. She also suffers from inflation and price fluctuations related to running her business. Her personal goal is to educate her children and her business goal is to diversify her business. Kasifa is requesting a loan to buy rice and sugar to sell in her shop.

loans.use: To buy rice and sugar to sell.

loans.name: El Tabor Group

texts.es:
Alexander, tiene 31 años de edad, vive en la aldea Tobar de Intibucá, junto a su esposa y sus dos hijos de 4 y 5 años de edad.
Alexander desde pequeño ha trabajado en la agricultura junto a su padre y hace 15 años que se independizo, realizando sus propios cultivos de lechuga y brócoli. para poderle dar un mantenimiento y asistencia al cultivo está solicitando un préstamo por 3,000.00 Lempiras, ya es el segundo préstamo obtenido en ODEF y lo va invertir en comprar abono para el cultivo de Lechuga y poder sacar buenas cosechas. Su plan es mejorar la producción para obtener mejores ingresos que cubran los gastos familiares.

El pertenece a un grupo solidario de préstamo que se llama El Tabor y está conformado por 4 miembros en la foto se identifica con camiseta roja a la derecha, seguido esta Raimundo, María Benita y Alba Teresa a la izquierda. Todos viven en la comunidad y se dedican al cultivo de lechuga, coliflor y papas. El total del grupo es de 15,000.00 Lempiras.
texts.en:
Alexander, 31, lives in the village of Tobar in Intibucá with his wife and two children who are 4 and 5 years old.

Since he was little Alexander worked in agriculture helping his father and fifteen years ago became independent installing his own lettuce and broccoli crops.  In order to provide crop maintenance, he’s asking for a 3000 lempira loan.  This is his second loan from ODEF and he’s going to use it to buy manure for the lettuce crops to be able to reap good harvest.  His plan is to improve production to earn better income sufficient to cover family expenses.

He belongs to a communal bank called “El Tabor” that has four members.  In the photo he’s on the right wearing the red shirt.  Nest to him is Raimundo, María Benita and Alba Teresa is on the left.  They all live in the community and grow lettuce, cauliflower and potatoes.  The total group loan is for 15000 lempiras.

loans.use: to buy manure for his lettuce crops.

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en:
Ruth is 28 years old and single. She has been selling second hand clothes for the past 11 years.

This is her first loan with Kadet, KES 30,000. She was introduced by a Kadet client. She will use the loan funds to purchase stock of clothes for resale. Her hope is to operate her business in a permanent premise.

loans.use: to purchase stock of second hand clothes.

loans.name: Duncan

texts.en:
Duncan is 39 years old, married to Anita and they have four children. He is a scrap metal dealer and has been in the business for the past two years.

This is his first loan with Kadet Ltd. He was introduced by a Kadet client. He will use the loan amount to purchase more scrap metal for stock in his business. His hopes are to venture into rental houses business.

loans.use: to purchase stock.

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en:
Agnes is 32 years old, married to Wilfred, and they have one child. She sells charcoal and has been in the business for the past three years.

This is Agnes' first loan with Kadet. She was introduced by a Kadet client. She will use the loan to purchase more stock of charcoal for resale in her business. Her hopes and dreams are to open a large retail shop in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase stock.

loans.name: Daira Susana

texts.es: Daira de 41 años de edad tiene un negocio de variedades, el cual inició porque no tenía una fuente de empleo y como mujer cabeza de familia, debía ocuparse de su hija en lo relacionado a su bienestar y prosperidad. En su negocio vende productos variados,  como calzado, ropa femenina, chancletas, accesorios para el hogar, en las modalidades  contado y crédito. Daira  también está vinculada a una empresa, de la  cual recibe una guía especializada para la promoción  y venta de sus productos.  Su negocio poco a poco ha ido creciendo y ha logrado con él,  sacar adelante a su hija, con quien  sueña verla convertida en una persona exitosa. En la actualidad ha recibido 7 financiamientos de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con  ellos ha logrado hacer sus compras en mayor volumen,  mejorar su vida económica, obteniendo recursos de sus ganancias,  para educar a su hija. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, con el que comprará  mercancía que viene con descuentos en su catálogo y accesorios femeninos y ropa,  directamente a proveedores varios. Su mayor sueño es tener un amplio local donde hacer su buena oferta y su mayor desafió es capitalizar su microempresa, para  que su negocio crezca mucho mas, tal y  como ella lo sueña.
texts.en:
Daira, 41, has a business selling miscellaneous items that she started because she did not have a source of employment and as a female head of household had to see to her daughter’s wellbeing and prosperity.  She sells a variety of items in her business like shoes, women’s clothing, sandals, items for the home.  She sells both for cash and on credit.  She’s also associated with a firm that she gets specialized sales catalogues from to sell their products.  Her business has been growing bit by bit and she’s managed to move her daughter forward thanks to it; she dreams with seeing her become a successful person.

To date she has received 7 loans from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo that she’s used to buy in greater volume and to improve her economic life gaining benefits from her profits to educate her daughter. She is applying now for a Kiva loan that she will use to buy merchandise from her catalogue that’s discounted as well as women’s accessories and clothes directly from her suppliers.  Her greatest dream is to have a spacious locale where she can have good sales and her greatest challenge is capitalizing her micro business so that it will grow much more just like in her dreams

loans.use: to buy merchandise, women's accessories and clothes.

loans.name: Salifu S.'s Group

texts.en:
These are teachers of a primary school in Kabala town. Teachers of this noble institution have come to SMT, a partner of Kiva.org in Makeni, northern Sierra Leone, to seek a loan of 8,400,000 Sierra Leonean Leones (SLL) for the entire group. With the help of this loan, this group of teachers will be able to improve on their standard of living. 

Salifu is the leader of this group of teachers. Salifu was born in Falaba, a village near Kabala town. He is forty-eight years old and married to a businesswoman. Salifu has three children who are attending primary and secondary schools. He has been a teacher for twenty-five years. He has requested this loan in order to pay school fees for his children. 

School staff from this institution, like many other school staff within SMT’s operational areas, come to SMT to apply for loans. With the help of these loans, they can accomplish some certain tasks that they would otherwise have not being able to accomplish with their mere salaries alone. But with the help of this loan, some can pay school fees for their children; others can use the loan to buy pieces of furniture, a plot of land, house-building materials, or invest in business. At the end of each month, these teachers can repay the loan out of their monthly salaries. The institution’s bursar is directly responsible for deducting the repayment and pays SMT on their behalf.

loans.use: to pay school fees for his children.

loans.name: Andrew A.'s Group

texts.en:
These are teachers at a secondary school in Kabala town. Teachers of this noble institution have come to SMT, a partner of Kiva.org in Makeni, northern Sierra Leone, to seek a loan of 7,000,000 SLL for the entire group. With the help of this loan, this group of teachers will be able to improve on their standards of living. 

29-year-old Andrew is the leader of this group of teachers. Andrew was born in a place called Hafip. He is single and has one child who is attending primary school. Andrew is a teacher and has been in the teaching profession for four years now. He has requested this loan in order to buy house-building materials (bags of cement, iron corrugated zincs, nails, etc.) for the construction of a family house. 

School staff from this institution, like many other school staff within SMT’s operational areas, come to SMT to apply for loans. With the help of these loans, they can accomplish certain tasks that they otherwise would not have been able to accomplish with their salaries alone. But with the help of this loan, some can pay school fees for their children; others can use the loan to buy pieces of furniture, a plot of land, house-building materials, or invest in business. At the end of each month, these teachers can repay the loan out of their monthly salaries. The institution’s bursar is directly responsible for deducting the repayment and pays SMT on their behalf.

loans.use: to buy house-building materials

loans.name: Pedro Luis

texts.es: Pedro  de 22 años de edad es un tecnólogo de administración logística portuaria , que estando desempleado hace un año, con el apoyo de su familia decidió emprender su propia aventura de negocios para darle curso a sus deseo de generar sus propios ingresos y  ser independiente. Así buen como ubicó una sala de internet, donde presta este servicio, además de transcripciones, telefonia y de comercializar papelería y útiles escolares inició. Lo primero que tuvo en cuenta fue el tipo de negocio y por eso recurrió a una actividad que llamara su atención,  también tomó en cuenta  su entorno, para identificar un potencial que requiriera de estos servicios  y justamente se encuentra al lado de un colegio de primaria y de bachillerato. Hoy sus  principales clientes son sus vecinos, estudiantes, profesores y le ha ido muy bien, porque ahora cuenta con el apoyo de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, donde está aplicando  a un credikiva, su primer financiamiento, con el cual comprará 4monitores de computador de escritorio, porque quiere hacer de sus instalaciones un ambiente confortable y seguro,  que cautive y fidelice a sus clientes, pues los que actualmente son obsoletos, con una resolución baja que atenta contra la visión.
texts.en:
Pedro is 22 years old and he is a port logistic administration technologist. Having been unemployed for a year, he decided - with his family's support - to embark on his own business venture in order to channel his desire to generate his own income and be independent.
He set up an Internet cafe, where he offers Internet service, as well as transcription and phone services. He also sells stationery and school supplies.
The first thing he considered was the type of business, and that is why he turned to an occupation which interested him. He also took into account his environment, in order to identify potential in services that were needed. In fact, he is situated next to an elementary school and a high school. Today his main clients are neighbors, students, and teachers. 
Things have gone very well, because he now counts on support from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, where he is requesting a Kiva loan. It is his first financing, and he will use it to purchase four monitors for his desktop computers. He wants to make his business place a comfortable and safe environment, that may captivate customers and cultivate their loyalty. His current monitors are obsolete and have low resolution, which can be harmful for the eyes.

loans.use: to purchase 4 desktop computer monitors

loans.name: Norma Isaber

texts.es: Norma de 61 años vende productos mediante guías especializadas. Ella tiene 2 hijos mayores de edad y trabajaba en una empresa, pero  una vez enfrentó la muerte de otro de ellos, sacó todas sus fuerzas para apoyar la educación de sus nietos y por eso inició su negocio. Con sus ventas dejó de ser empleada y ha sido tan importante su trabajo que se ha convertido en la vendedora Número 1 de la Costa Atlántico. Su experticia en su negocio la ha llevado a incrementar sus ventas y por eso ha acudido a créditos de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, organización con la cual ha tenido  5 financiamientos con los que ha logrado una gran satisfacción, por el apoyo que ha podido dar a su familia. En la actualidad está aplicando a su primer credikiva, con el cual comprará cosméticos que tiene encargados y mercancía variada para surtir su negocio. Su inversión será exitosa porque comprará los artículos en descuentos que traen sus catálogos y obtendrá mayores utilidades.
texts.en:
Norma, 61, sells products via specialized catalogues.  She has two adult children and she used to work for a firm but once had to confront the death of one of them.  She gathered all her strength to support her grandchildren’s education and this is why she started her business.  

With her sales she was able to stop being an employee and her work has been so important that she’s become the Number One Saleswoman on the Atlantic coast.  Her experience in business has brought her increased sales and this is why she has called on Fundación Mario Santo Domingo loans, an organization she’s had five loans with that brought her much satisfaction because of the support she’s been able to give her family.  

She is currently applying for her first Kiva loan that she will use to buy cosmetics she has pending orders for and assorted merchandise to stock her business.  Her investment will be successful because she will buy items that are on discount in her catalogues thus obtaining higher profits.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics and assorted merchandise for her business.

loans.name: Abu B's Group

texts.en:
In the photo above are teachers of a primary school in Kabala, a town in northern Sierra Leone. These diligent and hard-working teachers have come to SMT/Kiva lenders to apply for a loan of 5,700,000 Sierra Leonean Leones (SLL) in order to help them pay school fees for their children, invest in businesses, buy pieces of furniture, buy a plot of land, etc. At the end of each month, they will repay the loan, using their monthly salaries. Their school's bursar is directly responsible for doing the deductions and making the repayments on their behalf. 

Abu is the leader of this group of teachers. The 58-year-old is a native of the village of Yisiaia Diang. He is married to a businesswoman and the couple has four children – two in primary school and two in secondary school. Abu has served in the teaching profession for 35 years now. He has requested this loan in order to buy building materials like bags of cement, iron, corrugated zinc, etc. for the construction of a house.

loans.use: to buy building materials like bags of cement, iron, corrugated zinc, etc. for the construction of a house

loans.name: Lizeida

texts.es: Lizeida de 52 años de edad vive en la ciudad de Cartagena y tiene 4 hijos en las edades de 26 a 32 años. Ella es la propietaria de un restaurante que inició hace 2 años con un pequeño capital que reunió con dinero de sus hijos y al que puso su ímpetu de trabajo, para hacerlo  crecer poco a poco. Hoy vende 80 almuerzos diariamente y proyecta suministrar 60 mas, que le ha solicitado  una empresa,  que se los  pagará a crédito mensualmente. Su meta es lograr tener un capital de trabajo suficiente,  para comprar en mayores cantidades y tener materias primas e insumos disponibles,  para preparar  lo proyectado. Esta es justamente la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que tiene con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará materias primas,  como aceite, arroz, tubérculos, legumbres, con los cuales espera responder su nuevo pedido y ganar descuentos por compras en volumen y de contado. Esta es  justamente lo que hará que su inversión tenga éxito.
texts.en:
Lizeida, 52, lives in the city of Cartagena and has four children whose ages range between 26 and 32 years.  She owns a restaurant she started two years ago with a small amount of capital she was able to gather from her children; she put much drive into her work to make it grow little by little.  

Today, she sells 80 lunches daily and is projecting to grow by 60 more that a certain firm has requested from her and that she provides on credit payable monthly.  Her goal is to have sufficient working capital to buy larger amounts of raw materials and have supplies on hand to prepare the projected extra meals.  

This is precisely the reason for calling on a Kiva loan, her first financing from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo that she will use to buy raw materials like oil, rice, tubers and vegetables to be able to respond to the new order and earn discounts for buying in large amounts and for paying cash and this is precisely what will make her investment be successful.

loans.use: to buy raw materials like oil, rice, tubers and vegetables.

loans.name: Narcisa

texts.es: Con su credikiva Narcisa compró Kits de aseo y productos de belleza que vendió y aumentó ligeramente su capital de trabajo. En la actualidad está aplicando  a un credikiva nuevo, con el cual comprará accesorios para celulares , pues desea agregar nuevos productos, por los que le han preguntado y ella no los tiene. Su credikiva se postula como exitoso, porque atenderá una demanda diversificando su oferta ea aumentando sus utilidades. Su mensaje a los finaciadores de Kiva es el siguiente: Gracias por apoyarme, que el señor les abra las puertas, para que puedan seguir apoyando a microempresarios como yo"
texts.en: Narcisa used her Kiva loan to buy cleaning kits and beauty products that she sold slightly increasing her working capital.  She’s now applying for a new Kiva loan that she’ll use to buy mobile phone accessories because she wants to add new products that she’s had requests for and she does not stock.  Her Kiva loan is potentially successful because she will respond to demand diversifying her offer and increasing her profits.  Her message to Kiva lenders is the following:  “Thank you for supporting me.  May the Lord open doors so that you can continue supporting micro businesswomen like me.”

loans.use: to buy mobile phone accessories.

loans.name: Ingrid Del Rosario

texts.es: Ingrid con su anterior credikiva compró mercancia variada como útiles escolares, productos de belleza y ropa para niños. Con su inversión está satisfecha y ahora está aplicando a un nuevo cedikiva con el cual comprará las líneas de productos que comercializa actualmente como papelería, cosméticos, ropa infantil y tambien productos de farmacia pues ellos tienen una gran demanda en el sector. Su mensaje a los finacaidores de Kiva es el siguiente: " Gracias por darme la oportunidad de progresar y sacar adelante a mi familia. "
texts.en: Ingrid used her last Kiva loan to buy assorted merchandise like school supplies, beauty products and children’s clothes.  She’s satisfied with her investment and is applying for a new Kiva loan to buy product lines she currently sells like stationery supplies, cosmetics, children’s clothes and also pharmacy items because they are in great demand in her sector.  Her message to Kiva lenders is the following:  “Thanks for giving me the opportunity to make progress and to move my family forward.”

loans.use: to buy stationery supplies, cosmetics, children's clothes and pharmaceuticals.

loans.name: Dolores Maria

texts.es: Dolores de 42 años de edad  vive con su cónyuge y sus dos hijos en las edades de 2 y 6 años. Ella se dedica a las tareas artesanales, las cuales aprendió por tradición  familiar, de su madre quien es experta en el tejido en telar vertical. Por eso desde muy joven las conocía perfectamente y cuando organizó su familia,  se dedicó a ellas. Posteriormente  empezó a vender cervezas hace muchos años en el mes de Diciembre  y como le fue muy bien la adicionó a sus ingresos, mientras su esposo también lo hace,  prestando el servicio de transporte a la ciudad de Cartagena. Su meta es ampliar sus negocios y también tener su propia casa. En la actualidad su mayor desafió es que ante las expectativas de inversión, su capital de trabajo resulta insuficiente para hacer todo lo que planea. Esta es la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará hilos, hilazas, y bebidas para vender los fines de semanas, para continuar fortaleciendo el ingreso familiar. Su inversión proyecta  ser exitosa porque con ella fabricará bolsos, mochilas y hamacas que tiene encargadas y también aumentará la posibilidad de vender cada vez más cervezas.
texts.en:
Dolores, 42, lives with her spouse and two children who are 2 and 6 years old.  She does crafts that she learned as a family tradition since her mother is an expert on the vertical loom.  Because of this since very young she’s known them perfectly and when she formed her own family she went into it.  Later on she started to sell beer many years ago during the month of December and since she did very well added this to her income; her husband contributes too working providing transportation service in the city of Cartagena.  

Her goal is to expand her business and also to have a house of her own.  Her greatest challenge is that in face of investment expectation, her working capital is insufficient to do everything she plans and this is the reason why she’s calling on her Kiva loan, the first financing from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo that she’ll use to buy thread, yarn and also beverages to sell on the weekend to continue strengthening family income.  Her investment is potentially successful because with it she will manufacture purses, backpacks and hammocks that she has pending orders for and will also increase the possibility of selling more beer each time.

loans.use: to buy thread and yarn to make hammocks and purses and to buy soft-drinks to sell on the weekend.

loans.name: Musa P.'s Group

texts.en:
Pictured here are teachers of a primary school in Kabala, a town in northern Sierra Leone. This group of teachers has come to SMT, a partner of Kiva, to apply for a loan. These loans help these teachers and their counterparts within Kabala and SMT's other operational areas to solve certain financial challenges that their salaries alone cannot solve. At the end of each month, they repay SMT/Kiva lenders using their monthly salaries. Their bursar is directly responsible for doing the deductions and making the repayments on their behalf.

The leader of this group is Musa. Musa is a native of Timbako village, in northern Sierra Leone. The sixty-two-year-old is married and has five children – one in primary school, three in secondary school and one in college. Musa has been a teacher for twelve years now. He has requested this loan in order to pay school fees for his children and will use the rest to buy house building materials.

loans.use: to pay school fees for his children and to buy house building materials

loans.name: Guido Ulbio

texts.es:
Guido es un hombre de 46 años que vive junto a su familia (tiene dos hijos) en "San Miguel de Los Bancos" que es uno de las 9 cantones de la Provincia de Pichincha, donde se encuentra la capital del Ecuador, posee 52 centros poblados entre comunidades, recintos y cooperativas distribuidas en toda la geografía cantonal. El territorio cantonal se encuentra un importante recurso natural como es el Bosque Protector Mindo Nambillo; una gran superficie del área cantonal se encuentra ocupada de pastizales ya que la principal actividad del cantón es la ganadería, también se realizan cultivos de palmito, caña de azúcar, plátano, naranjilla y cacao en pequeñas superficies.

Guido desde hace algunos años se dedica a sembrar cacao para luego comercializarlo; esta actividad le ha permitido mantener a su familia y darles una vida modesta. Guido quiere mejorar su sembrío comprando más semillas (para incrementar la superficie sembrada)  y fertilizantes e insumos de mejor calidad. De esta manera el piensa obtener mayores ingresos y con ello una mejor calidad de vida. 

A pesar de haber tenido obstáculos en su vida el no quiso hablar de ellos, nos comenta que actualmente se maneja con normalidad. Espera poder a sus hijos todo lo necesario para que puedan desarrollarse en un ambiente sano y cubrir sus necesidades.
texts.en:
Guido is a 46 year old man living with his family (he has two children) in San Miguel de los Bancos, one of the nine cantons in Pichincha Province where Ecuador’s capital is found.  It has 52 populated centers among communities, hamlets and cooperatives distributed along the entire canton.  

Within the canton’s boundaries is found an important natural resource:  the Mindo Nambillo Ecological Reserve, a large surface area in the canton full of grasslands since the canton’s main activity is cattle raising.  It also has palmetto, sugarcane, banana, ‘naranjilla’ [small green orange used in making a conserve] and cocoa beans in small tracts.

For some years now Guido has been growing cocoa beans to sell.  This activity has helped him support his family and give them a modest life.  Guido wants to improve his crops buying more seeds (to increase planted surface area), fertilizer and better quality supplies in order to earn higher income and with it attain a better quality of life.

Despite having many obstacles in his life, he did not want to talk about them.  He comments that he’s currently living normally.  He hopes to give his children everything they need to develop in a healthy environment where all their needs are met.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer for his cocoa bean crops.

loans.name: Ramon

texts.es:
Ramón, se dedica a la elaboración de anillos para las cumas, vive con su esposa y tienen su hija de un año de edad, él aprendió el negocio de su padre y hermanos mayores, lo hace en horarios 8:00am a 4:00pm, su dificultad es que este negocio es de temporada, mientras esta la preparación de los cultivos.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo pues lo necesita para la compra de hierro para elaborar alrededor de unos 5000 anillos, esto le permitirá tener una mejor capacidad para atender la demanda, ya que entregara todos los pedidos.
Él tiene el objetivo de ayudar a su familia y superarse, junto a su esposa e hija, construir su propia vivienda.
texts.en:
Ramón manufactures rings for ‘cumas’ [type of machete].  He lives with his wife and they have a one year old daughter.  He learned his business from his father and older brothers.  He works from 8am until 4pm.  His difficulty is that this is a seasonal business while the population is preparing their crops.

He is asking for a loan now because he needs it to buy metal to manufacture about 5000 rings; this will allow him to have better capacity to respond to demand because he will be able to fill all his order.  

His objective is to help his family improve itself alongside his wife and daughter and to build his own house.

loans.use: to buy metal.

loans.name: Abel Joaquin

texts.es: Abel de 36 años de edad vive en la ciudad de Barranquilla y dese hace un poco mas de 3 años, se vinculó a  una empresa de lácteos donde prestaba su servicio como distribuidor de leche en tiendas y en otros negocios. Desde hace un año se independizó,  porque la empresa donde trabajaba le proporcionó un furgón, el cual conduce con su motocicleta. Así fue como    lo programaron en una zona ubicada en los sectores centro y norte de la ciudad de Barranquilla,  donde tiene sus principales clientes. Su actividad la inicia por las mañanas, entregando los productos lácteos a crédito y al siguiente día regresa para cobrar;  Abel para el almacenamiento de los productos que vende tiene arrendada una bodega donde conserva sus productos para la distribución y también guarda su vehículo. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará leche en mayor volumen, y nuevas líneas de productos alimenticios; con esta inversión planea abordar nuevos mercados y aumentar sus ingresos, porque con su experiencia,  este dinero muy seguramente se multiplicará en ganancias. Su meta mas adelante es ampliar su cobertura en  la ciudad y poder generar empleos contratando a mas personas para vender.
texts.en:
Abel is 36 years old and lives in the city of Barranquilla. A little over three years ago, he started working with a dairy product company where he provided services as milk distributor for stores and other businesses. A year ago he became independent, because the company where he worked supplied him with a trailer, which he drives with his motorcycle. That is how he was assigned to the area located in the downtown and northern sectors of the city of Barranquilla, where he has his main customers. 
He starts work in the morning, delivering dairy products on credit and returning the next day for payment. In order to store the products he sells, Abel has rented a warehouse where he stockpiles his products for distribution and also keeps his vehicle.
Currently he is requesting a Kiva loan, which is the first financing he applied for at Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. He will use it to purchase milk in larger volume, and a new range of foodstuffs. With this investment, he plans to tackle new markets and increase his income, because with his experience, this money will very likely multiply into profit. 
Eventually, his goal is to expand his coverage area in the city and to be able to create jobs by hiring more sales people.

loans.use: to purchase milk in larger volume, and a new range of foodstuffs.

loans.name: Benito Geovanny

texts.es:
Benito, está soltero, vive junto a sus padres, se dedica al cultivo de maíz y crianza de ganado, desde hace 10 años, trabaja junto a su padre, desde las 6:00am hasta las 3:00pm, todos los días o dependiendo de la temporada agrícola.
El solicita un préstamo para el pago del arrendamiento del terreno, donde iniciara el cultivo de maíz, este préstamo le ayudara a realizar la nueva siembra, asegurando el terreno, el riesgo de Benito es la temporada de lluvia, que puede dañar el cultivo.
La aspiración de él es cultivar la tierra, ya que con la cosecha ayuda a sus familia con los gastos familiares.
texts.en:
Benito is single living with his parents; he has grown corn and raised livestock for the last ten years.  He works with his father from 6am until 3pm every day or according to the farming season.

He’s asking for a loan to pay the lease on land where he will start to grow corn.  This loan will help him start a new crop insuring that he’ll have land.  Benito’s risk is the rainy season that can damage the crop.  His goal is to cultivate the land because the harvest will help with family expenses.

loans.use: to pay to lease farmland.

loans.name: Santos Martir

texts.es:
El señor Santos tiene 52 años de edad, es casado y tiene seis hijos. Él se dedica a l comercio de ganado desde hace más de 20 años. Él compra y luego lo revende a un precio más alto y también se dedica al destazo de ganado, esta actividad la aprendió de su suegro y le genera muchos ingresos, lo que le ha permitido brindarle la alimentación a su familia. Santos tiene un puesto fijo donde comercializa el ganado ya destazado y lo hace tres veces por semana, los otros días se dedica al traslado de ganado de otros lugares hasta su casa para comercializar con ellos el día de plaza.

Santos, compra el ganado en los municipios aledaños, él debe recorrer largas distancias para conseguir un buen animal y ser vendido vivo o destazado, generándole una buena ganancia y llevar el alimento a su familia.

El préstamo que solicita, es para comprar tres vacas para comercializarlas. Así obtendrá un buen ingreso a la hora de venderlas. En un futuro desea enseñarles a sus hijos el negocio para que lo practiquen y puedan continuar con su vida de manera honrada. Además, desea recibir mejores ingresos para comprar más animales y llevar el sustento a su familia.
texts.en:
Santos, 52, is married and has six children.  He has been a livestock merchant for more than 20 years.  He buys and then resells at a higher price; he also butchers cattle, an activity he learned from his father-in-law that generates much income which has allowed him to feed his family.  

Santos has a fixed stand where he can sell the butchered livestock three times a week.  On the other days he brings livestock to his house from other places to then sell them on market days.  Santos buys livestock in adjacent towns.  He must travel great distances to get good animals to be sold either on the hoof or butchered earning good profits and providing food for his family.

The loan he’s requesting is to buy three cows to sell.  This way he will earn good income at the moment of selling them.  In the future he wants to teach the business to his children so that they can practice it and continue with their lives in an honest way.  Also, he wants to earn higher income to buy more animals and bring sustenance to his family.

loans.use: to buy three cows.

loans.name: Dimas

texts.es:
Dimas, se dedica a la sastrería, tiene 67 años de edad, vive en compañía de su esposa y una hija de 2 años, él aprendió el negocio hace 30 años, por iniciativa propia, viajo a Estados Unidos donde perfecciono el oficio, actualmente trabaja en las escuelas haciendo uniformes aparte de eso, costura a personas particulares, amigos y vecinos. 
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de telas, botones, ciper, hilos, estos materiales le ayudaran a mantener lo necesario para fabricar las prendas de vestir, saliendo con los pedidos que tiene.
La aspiración de Dimas es construir su vivienda, ya que tiene un solar a su nombre, espera que el negocio sea prospero y le permita realizar su objetivo.
texts.en:
Dimas, 67, is a tailor.  He lives with his wife and a two year old daughter.  He learned the business 30 years ago on his own initiative.  He traveled to the United States where he perfected his skills and he currently works in schools manufacturing uniforms.  In addition, he sews for individuals, friends and neighbors.

He’s asking for a loan to buy fabric, buttons, zippers and thread.  These supplies will help him have what he needs to make clothing on hand thereby filling his pending orders.  

His goal is to build his house since he has a piece of land in his name.  He hopes the business will prosper so that he will be able to reach his goal.

loans.use: to buy fabric, buttons, zippers and thread.

loans.name: Luz Mariel

texts.es:
Luz es una mujer de 42 años de edad, es soltera y tiene 3 hijos. Vive en casa propia en el sector Simón Bolívar en el distrito de Cayaltí. Luz tiene buenas relaciones con sus vecinos y excelentes referencias personales y laborales. 
La actividad a la que se dedica Luz es la venta de dulces, refrescos y además los días domingos prepara desayunos, los cuales los comercializa recorriendo su sector y los sectores aledaños.
El monto del préstamo asciende a 3000 nuevos soles, los cuales se emplearán para la implementación de su negocio, con artículos como tapers, cucharones, ollas, para la compra de los dulces que comercializa y además para la escolaridad de sus menores hijos que ya empiezan la etapa escolar.
texts.en:
Luz is a 42 year old woman; she’s single and has three children.  She lives in her own house in Cayaltí District’s Simón Bolívar sector.  Luz has good relationships with her neighbors and excellent personal and work references.

Luz’s activity is selling candy and soft-drinks.  In addition, she sells breakfasts on Sundays throughout her sector and adjacent sectors.

The loan ascends to 3000 new soles that she will use to equip her business with articles like Tupperware, ladles and pots.  She will also buy the candy she sells and will also use it for her minor children’s school costs since they are starting their schooling stage.

loans.use: to buy utensils for her business.

loans.name: Lila Gloria

texts.es:
Lila es una mujer de 51 años de edad, es casada y tiene dos hijos mayores de edad. Vive en casa propia con su esposo e hijos, la cual se ubica en el sector CPM San Luis, en el distrito de La Victoria. Vive en la zona rural del distrito, pero cuenta con servicios de luz y agua.
Lila se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales de corral, los cuales los cría en su domicilio, teniendo ya 15 años de experiencia en el rubro. Además, Lila también tiene una bodega en su domicilio donde vende abarrotes, frutas y verduras.
El monto del crédito es de 1500 nuevos soles, los cuales se emplearán para la adquisición de productos de primera necesidad, tales como arroz, azúcar, sal, leche, para surtir su bodega, y para la compra de animales y alimento para ellos.
texts.en:
Lila is a 52 year old woman who’s married and has two adult children.  She lives in her own house with her husband and children located in La Victoria District’s CPM San Luis sector.  She lives in the rural part of the sector but does have electricity and water.

Lila raises small farm animals at home to sell ; she has 15 years’ experience in this line of work. Lila also has a home-based grocery store where she sells groceries, fruit and vegetables.

The loan is for the amount of 1500 new soles that she will use to buy basic staple items like rice, sugar, salt and milk to stock her store and to buy animals and feed for them.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock her store.

loans.name: Kulako

texts.en: Pictured here is Kulako, a small-scale businesswoman in Kabala, a town in northern Sierra Leone.  Forty-year-old Kulako, a native of Kono and a single mother of  two children, has been a businesswoman for more than 20 years now. She sells rice, groundnuts, cooking oil, gari, etc. and also retails clothes. Kulako has requested this loan in order to buy the above-mentioned items in bulk to add to her business.

loans.use: to buy rice, groundnuts, cooking oil, gari, etc. in bulk to add to her business.

loans.name: Santos Elizabeth

texts.es:
Santos, se dedica a la venta de tortillas y tamales, es una persona de hogar, vive con su esposo y dos hijos, ella aprendió su ocupación por iniciativa propia, ya tiene 15 años de estar vendiendo tortillas y tamales, apoyando a su esposo con los ingresos de su familia.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de leña, maíz, condimentos, hojas de banano, que son los insumos necesarios para la elaboración de su venta, esto le mejorara el inventario y estar preparada para las ventas.
La aspiración de Santos es que su negocio mejore, para tener más solvencia económica y poder construir un nuevo cuarto en la vivienda.
texts.en:
Santos sells tortillas and tamales [Corn and cornmeal dough stuffed with a meat mixture then wrapped in corn husks and steamed]. She is a homebody, living with her husband and two children. She learned the business on her own initiative. She has been selling tortillas and tamales for 15 years. Thus, helping her husband to support their family. 

She will use the loan to buy wood, corn, condiments, and plantain leaves, which are the materials required to prepare her product. This will increase her inventory and help her with product sales.

Santos aspirations are to improve her business for her to increase her financial solvency and build a new room in her house.

loans.use: to buy wood, corn, condiments, and plantain leaves.

loans.name: Dinora Del Carmen

texts.es:
Dinora, vive con su esposo, no tienen hijos, los dos trabajan, ella en la administración de un comedor, este negocio lo aprendió donde trabajo anteriormente como ayudante, ya tiene experiencia en el negocio.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de material para hacer la comida, comprara aceite, carnes, condimentos, gaseosas, platos, tenedores, servilletas, y otros materiales que son necesarios para que el negocio marche bien.
La aspiración de Dinora es que su negocio crezca, atender  a más clientes, mejorar la calidad de sus productos, para generar mayores ganancias.
texts.en:
Dinora lives with her husband; they have no children.  Both of them work; she running an eatery, a business she learned where she was previously employed as an assistant.  She has experience in this business.

She’s asking for a loan to buy ingredients to make meals.  She will buy oil, meat, condiments, soft-drinks, plates, forks, napkins and other supplies needed so that the business will operate well.

Dinora’s goal is that the business grows, to tend to more customers, to improve the quality of her products to generate higher profits.

loans.use: to buy oil, meat, condiments, soft-drinks, plates, forks and napkins.

loans.name: Heriberto De Jesus

texts.es:
Heriberto, vive con su familia, su esposa y dos hijos, solo él trabaja en el hogar, dedicándose a la albañilería, su esposa es ama de casa, él aprendió de unos amigos, con quienes había trabajado, no tiene un horario fijo y ya cuenta con experiencia.
Él solicita un préstamo para la compra de algunas herramientas de trabajo como pala, piocha, azadón, que estas le ayudan a realizar mejor el trabajo en la construcción, este préstamo será de mucha ayuda para que Heriberto pueda cubrir esta necesidad.
La aspiración de Heriberto es que a través de préstamos, pueda adquirir lo necesario y desempeñar un buen trabajo a los clientes, pues su familia depende de él.
texts.en:
Heriberto lives with his family: his wife and two children.  In his home, only he works.  He’s a bricklayer and his wife’s a housewife.  He learned from some friends he had worked with.  He has no fixed work schedule and he already has experience.

He’s asking for a loan to buy some work tools like shovel, hoe and pickaxe that will help him do better construction work.  This loan will be of great help to him so that Heriberto can cover this need.

Heriberto’s goal is that through loan he will be able to acquire what’s needed to do good jobs for his customers because his family depends on him.

loans.use: to buy work tools.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy house-building materials including cement, iron, and corrugated zinc for the construction of a dwelling house and invest the rest of the loan in business.

loans.name: Angela Maria

texts.es:
Ángela, vive con su papá y un hermano, está soltera y no tiene hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de pupusas, este negocio lo aprendió de su madre, quien ya falleció, trabaja por las tardes, tiene experiencia en la preparación de la venta.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de maíz, aceite, gas y bebidas, estos materiales le permitirán tener lo necesario para preparar las pupusas, teniendo una mejor capacidad y atender mejor a la clientela.
La aspiración de Ángela es que su negocio sea exitoso, contando con más clientes y proveyendo todo lo necesario a su familia.
texts.en:
Ángela, lives with her father and brother.  She’s single and has no children.  She sells ‘pupusas’ [grilled corn cakes].  She learned this business from her mother who is now deceased.  She works afternoons and has experience preparing the sales.

She is asking for a loan to buy corn, oil, gas and beverages.  These materials will make it possible for her to make the pupusas thereby being better able to meet customer demand.  Ángela’s hope is that her business is successful with more customers and providing everything necessary for her family.

loans.use: to buy corn, oil, gas and beverages.

loans.name: Ricardo Antonio

texts.es:
El señor Ricardo tiene 35 años de edad, es casado y tiene un hijo. Él se dedica a la agricultura desde su niñez, fue su papá quien le enseño ese trabajo. El cual le ha servido para llevarle el sustento a su familia. 

Él compra los materiales en la ciudad más cercana a unos tres kilómetros de su casa y como no hay trasporte publico, él debe buscar un vehiculo que lo transporte hasta su casa y esto le genera mayores gastos económicos.

El préstamo que solicita, es para comprar madera, lamina y teja. Para mejorar su vivienda ya que el invierno se aproxima y tiene que terminar la construcción. De esta manera el podrá vivir en su casa junto a su familia y le generara un ingreso extra ya que donde esta viviendo actualmente es alquilado. Mas adelante, Ricardo desea ampliar su casa y brindarle una mejor vida a su familia, con su trabajo de agricultor desea cultivar más y así obtener mejores ingresos y darles una buena educación a sus hijos y que sean unas personas de bien en su comunidad.
texts.en:
Ricardo, 35, is married and has a son.  He’s been a farmer since childhood; his father taught him this work which has served him to provide sustenance for his family.  He buys his supplies in the nearest city which is about three kilometers from his house and since there is no public transportation he must find a vehicle to transport him to his house and this means higher costs.

The loan he’s asking for is to buy lumber, metal sheeting and roofing tiles to improve his house since winter is approaching and he has to finish the construction.  In this way, he will be able to live in his house with his family and he will have extra income since the place they live in at present is rented.  Later on Ricardo wants to enlarge his house to provide his family a better life.  In his work as a farmer he wants to farm more so that he can earn higher income and provide a good education for his children so that they will become upstanding citizens in their community.

loans.use: to buy lumber, metal sheeting and roofing tiles.

loans.name: Stephanie

texts.es: Durante el año 2011 Stephanie pudo utilizar el préstamo anterior invirtiendo en capital de trabajo , compra de materiales y otros, sin embargo a finales del mismo su esposo sufrio una lesión en su pie, por lo que fue incapacitado durante dos meses , en los cuales Stephanie tuvo que hacerse cargo de pagar el alquiler de su casa y asumir otros gastos , pues su esposo recibía menos del 50% de lo que recibe generalmente. Por estas razones Stephanie esta solicitando un nuevo crédito para invertir en la compra de materia prima para hacer unos adornos a los que llamamos manualidades en foam, que serán vendidas en escuelas y a maestras que los utilizan como motivo para las efemerides(celebraciones especiales de dias de fiesta nacional, como la independencia, la anexion de Guanacaste y otras). Actualmente Stephanie esta recibiendo unos cursos para aprender otras técnicas y poder hacer otros productos que sus clientes le piden ,pués según ella misma lo dice , a las clientas les gustan sus productos por el buen acabado que tienen. Esta actividad la combina con la venta de mercadería, de esta forma desarrolla algunas otras habilidades que tiene, y darse a conocer en otros lugares.
texts.en:
During 2011 Stephanie was able to use her previous loan investing in working capital purchasing materials and others.  However, toward the end of that year her husband suffered a foot injury which kept him disabled for two months in which Stephanie had to take over paying rent on their house and taking on other expenses too because her husband was only earning 50% of his usual salary.

Because of this, Stephanie is asking for a new loan to buy raw materials to make decorations out of foam to sell to schools and teachers who use them to mark special occasions (national feast days like independence, the annexation of Guanacaste and others).

Stephanie is currently taking courses to learn other techniques to make other types of products her customers request since as she herself says, her customers like her items because of the nice way they are finished.  She combines this activity with selling merchandise thus developing other abilities she has and making herself known in other places.

loans.use: Compra de materia prima para confeccionar adornos  to buy raw materials to make decorations.

loans.name: Ahliddin

texts.ru: Ахлиддин проживает в районе Вахш. Ему 24 года. Он холост. Живет вместе с родителями. Его мать занимается торговлей одежды. Сам Ахлиддин занимается купле - продажей железа. Кроме того он занимается торговлей женской и детской одежды. В этой области он два года. Кредит берет для покупки весенней женской одежды и железа.
texts.en: Ahliddin lives Vakhsh region. He is 24 years old. He is single and lives together with his parents. His mother sells clothing. Ahliddin buys and resells scrap metal. In addition, he sells women’s and children’s clothing. He has been in this business for two years. He is taking out a loan in order to buy women’s clothing for the spring season as well as scrap metal.

loans.use: to buy women’s clothing for the spring season as well as scrap metal.

loans.name: Juan Manuel

texts.es:
Juan, vive con su esposa y tres hijos, se dedica al destazo de reces, su esposa e hijos le ayudan a realizar el trabajo, él inicio con el negocio con el apoyo de la esposa, pues ella estaba anteriormente dedica a esta labor, lo realizan una vez por semana y venden la carne de forma ambulante.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de una vaca, para destazar, esto le permitirá realizar esta inversión y tener para seguir realizando el destazo, ya que su clientela se mantiene pendiente, esto le ayudara a satisfacerlos y tener más ventas.
El objetivo de Juan es tener el negocio bien establecido, con más clientela, y ofrecer mejores condiciones a su familia.
texts.en:
Juan lives with his wife and three children. He butchers cattle with the help of his wife and children. He started the business with his wife's help, since she previously worked in this business. They do this once a week and sell the meat as street vendors. 
He will use the loan to buy a cow to butcher. This will allow him to continue with his business since his clients wait for his product. Thus, helping him to meet demand and increase sales. Juan's objective is to have a well-established business with more clients and offer better living conditions to his family.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Ruby

texts.es: Ruby  de 51 años de edad, tiene un hijo de 30 años y vive con su familia al sur de la ciudad. Ella tiene un negocio mediante el cual presta servicios de internet y también vende mercancías variadas. En su negocio  de mercancías, promociona sus productos mediante catálogos, que muchas veces traen ofertas que sus clientes aprovechan y es muy conveniente para Ruby,  porque también le hacen muchos pedidos.  El servicio de internet lo ofrece en un local arrendado en el mismo barrio en el cual habita. Ambos negocios surgieron por la necesidad de generar ingresos que le aportaran un mayor  bienestar a su hogar, por eso ella y su cónyuge ahorraron e iniciaron con estas actividades en las cuales trabajan los dos. Su meta mas adelante es tener un café internet y un local propio para que funcione la miscelánea. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, con el cual comprará mercancías variadas y hará adecuaciones a su espacio locativo. Su inversión será exitosa   porque está basada en pedidos y porque mostrará a sus clientes un ambiente confortable que les agradará cuando estos hagan sus compras.
texts.en:
Ruby, 51, has a 30-year-old son and lives with her family in the south of the city.  She has a business in which she offers Internet services and also sells a variety of merchandise.  In her merchandise business she promotes her products via catalogues, which often have offers that her customers make the most of.  It is very convenient for Ruby because they also place orders with her.  She offers the Internet service in a rented place in the same neighborhood where she lives.

Both businesses came from the need to generate income so she could have greater well-being for her household.  For this reason she and her husband saved and started with these activities, in which they both work.  Her long-term goal is to have an Internet cafe and her own place for the shop.

Currently she is requesting a Kiva loan to buy a variety of merchandise and make improvements to her space.  Her investment will be successful because it is based on orders and because she will show her customers a comfortable environment that will please them when they make their purchases.

loans.use: to buy a variety of merchandise and to make improvements to her space.

loans.name: Jose Gerardo

texts.es:
José es un hombre de 69 años de edad, casado y vive con su esposa. Vive en casa propia en el sector Santos Vera en el distrito de Túcume, domicilio que cuenta con los servicios de luz y agua y su comunidad está compuesta por aproximadamente 60 familias.
La actividad a la que se dedica José es a la venta de animales en las zonas aledañas al distrito de Túcume, ya cuenta con clientela fija. Además, también se dedica a labores relacionadas con la agricultura.
El monto del préstamo asciende a 2000 soles, los cuales se emplearán en la compra de ganado caprino para su venta, de alimento balanceado para estos y para el arreglo y remodelación de su corral.
texts.en:
José is a man of 69 years, is married, and lives with his wife.  He lives in his own home in the Santos Vera sector in the district of Túcume, which has electricity and water services, and his community is composed of approximately 60 families.

The way José makes a living is by selling animals in the areas surrounding the district of Túcume, and he already has regular customers.  In addition, he also makes a living with work related to agriculture.  

The amount of the loan is 2000 Peruvian soles, which he will use to buy goats to sell, balanced feed for them, and in the arrangement and remodeling of his pen.

loans.use: to buy more animals and balanced feed.

loans.name: Lidubina Inés

texts.es:
Inés es una mujer joven de 27 años, madre soltera de dos niños (de 1 y 8 años), juntos viven en "San Miguel de Los Bancos" que es un cantón rural de la Provincia de Pichincha, donde se encuentra la capital del Ecuador. Uno de los principales recursos "Los Bancos" es el hídrico ya que  en su territorio se originan un sin número de riachuelos y pequeñas vertientes que dan paso a ríos de considerable tamaño. Este cantón tiene un gran movimiento comercial que se desenvuelve en la calle principal, donde se encuentran hoteles, restaurantes y almacenes, sobre todo de productos agropecuarios, así como servicios veterinarios y tiendas para el consumo diario de la población.

Inés mantiene a sus hijos sola, ella tiene una tienda de víveres desde hace tres años en el cantón donde reside. Este negocio lo aprendió de un antiguo trabajo que tenía. Ella desea invertir en comprar mercadería para su tienda, quiere incrementar el surtido por lo cual necesita de un crédito. Fundación Alternativa, que es una ONG (Organización no Gubernamental) que trabaja con KIVA y su comunidad a nivel mundial, erradicando la pobreza, le brindará a Inés no solo la oportunidad de un crédito sino también la posibilidad de capacitarse y de tener asesoría técnica para que así pueda crecer de una manera sostenible.

Trabaja un promedio de diez horas al día junto a su pequeña hija y su gran sueño es mejorar la calidad de vida de ella y de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Inés is a 27-year-old young woman, the single mother of two children (ages 1 and 8).  Together they live in San Miguel de los Bancos, a rural canton in the province of Pichincha, where the capital of Ecuador is located.  One of the main resources in Los Bancos is water, because this region is the origin of a great number of streams and small springs that give way to considerably sized rivers.  This canton has a lot of commercial activity that is developed on the main street, where there are hotels, restaurants, and shops, especially of agricultural products as well as veterinarians and stores for the daily consumption items of the population.

Inés supports her children alone.  She has had a general store for three years in the canton where she lives.  She learned this business from a former job she had.

She wants to invest in buying merchandise for her store.  She wants to increase her stock, for which she needs a loan.  Fundación Alternativa,  an NGO (non-governmental organization) that works with Kiva and her community on a worldwide level to eradicate poverty, will give Inés not only the chance for a loan but also the possibility of training herself and of having technical advice so she can grow in a sustainable way.

She works an average of ten hours a day along with her young daughter.  Her big dream is to improve the quality of life for herself and her children.

loans.use: to invest in merchandise for her general store.

loans.name: Luis Ernesto

texts.es: Luis es padre de dos hijos en las edades de 19 y 22 años. El vive al sur de la ciudad con uno de ellos y con su cónyuge, quien es comerciante, mientras Luis  se dedica al comercio de frutas y verduras, con estos productos, recorre algunos barrios de la ciudad y tienen muchos clientes que le compran y lo esperan para hacerle pedidos. Luis es un barranquillero,  que llegó a estudios primarios y enseguida se dedicó a producir mediante un trabajo,  se casó a sus 26 años y continuó trabajando, para lograr sostener su hogar. En las tardes ofrece el servicio de transporte a una ferretería cercana a su vivienda; con el esfuerzo familiar  y su trabajo, ha logrado tener su propia casa, a la que mas adelante tiene como meta,  mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales. En la actualidad c para aumentar su potencial de ventas, pero su capital de trabajo se torna insuficiente para lograrlo, esta es la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, con el cual comprará de contado estos productos y tendrá la oportunidad de incursionar en nuevos barrios, donde existe un potencial de compradores que aumentarán sus ventas y esto es lo que justifica el éxito de su inversión.
texts.en: Luis is the father of two children, ages 19 and 22.  He lives with them and his wife in the south part of the city.  His wife is a merchant and Luis sells fruits and vegetables.  He travels through many neighborhoods around the city and has many customers who wait for him to place orders.  Luis is a Barraquilla native who completed elementary school and then became productive through his work. He married at age 26 and continued working to be able to support his household.  In the evenings he provides transportation services for a hardware store near his home.  His efforts and that of his family have allowed him to have a home of his own, which he has a goal of improving his living conditions.  Now he wants to increase his sales potential but he does not have enough working capital to do so, so he is requesting a Kiva loan so that he can buy these products.  This will allow him to enter new neighborhoods, where there are more potential buyers and increased sales.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables in quantity.

loans.name: Ana Amelia

texts.es:
Ana, se dedica a la venta de medicina de manera ambulante, tiene 46 años de edad, vive en casa propia con su esposo y 4 hijos, ella tiene ya 10 años de estar en el negocio, lo inicio con su esposo, juntos están realizando las ventas.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de más medicinas, vitaminas, antibióticos, medicamentos curativos, con esto podrá fortalecer el negocio, surtiéndolo para poder ofrecer a los clientes.
La aspiración de Ana es mejorar las condiciones de vida de sus hijos, con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo, para que tengan un mejor futuro y oportunidades de superación.
texts.en:
Ana sells medicines as a street vendor. She's 46 years old and lives with her husband and four children in their own house. She has been in this business for 10 years, which she started with her husband who helps her with sales. 

She will use the loan to buy more medicines, vitamins, antibiotics, and healing medicines. With this loan, she will be able to strengthen her business by stocking it for her clients. Ana's hope is to improve her children's living conditions with a lot of work and effort for them to have a better future and opportunities to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy vitamins, antibiotics, and curative medicines.

loans.name: Blanca Lidia

texts.es:
