Blanca, tiene 28 años de edad, vive con sus padres, está soltera, tiene dos hermanas, su padre es agricultor junto a sus hermanos, realizando la siembra de maíz,  tienen 10 años de estar en esta actividad, ya que son de bajos recursos económicos.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para comprar el abono y semilla mejorada, para que su padre inicie la siembra, con esto contara con el dinero para comprar lo necesario y apoyar a su padre en el trabajo con la tierra.
El Objetivo de Blanca es aportar su ayuda con su familia, ya que juntos saldrán adelante.
texts.en:
Blanca, 28, lives with her parents.  She is single and has two sisters.  Her father is a farmer along with her siblings, growing corn.  They have been doing this job for ten years because they have low economic resources.

She is requesting a loan to buy fertilizer and improved seed so her father can begin the planting.  With this she will have the money to buy the necessities and help her father with working the land.

Blanca's goal is to contribute her help to her family, because together they will get ahead.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and improved seed.

loans.name: Jose Virgilio

texts.es:
José, es agricultor, vive en casa propia con su esposa y dos hijos de 7 y 9 años de edad, se dedica a la siembra de maíz, trabaja en lo propio, aprendió con su padre cuando lo ayudaba, José realiza en cultivo en una manzana de terreno.
El está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de abono, herbicidas y semilla mejorada, con estos materiales podrá realizar bien el trabajo en la siembra, con la esperanza de que su producción sea mejor.
El objetivo de José es que su familia cuente con una condición digna, salir adelante en los estudios de sus hijos.
texts.en:
José is a farmer.  He lives in his own house with his wife and two children, ages 7 and 9.  He works growing corn on his own.  He learned with his father when he used to help him.  José produces his crop on a plot of land of one "manzana" [approximately 1.736 acres].

He is requesting a loan to buy fertilizer, herbicide, and improved seed.  With these supplies he will be able to do well in his job of planting, with the hope that his production will be better.

José's goal is for his family to have decent living conditions and to get ahead in his children's studies.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, herbicide, and improved seed.

loans.name: Los Laboriosos Group

texts.es:
El SR. Jesús Ulises, tiene 43 años de edad, es casado tiene 2 hijos. Él forma parte del grupo "Los laboriosos", integrado por seis socios, quienes se han unido para que de forma conjunta se apoyen y puedan surgir cada en su negocio. El Sr. Jesus Ulises se dedica a prestar servicio de pintura, es decir el pintado de fachadas de casas o instituciones, gracias a éste trabajo que lo realiza de forma independiente ha logrado mejorar la infraestructura de su casa y acabados, asi como también puede cubrir los gastos de estudios universitarios de su hijo mayor y los gastos de colegio del menor.
El préstamo recibido lo invertirá en la compra de herramientas y el mejoramiento de sus equipos para brindar un mejor servicio.
texts.en:
Jesús Ulises is 43 years old, married, and with two children. He is a member of the communal bank "Los Laboriosos" [The Hardworkers] made up of 6 partners who have come together to support each other succeed in their own businesses. 

Jesús Ulises provides painting services, such as painting façades for houses and institutions. Thanks to his work done independently, he has improved the infrastructure of his house and finishing. His business has also helped him cover the university costs of his oldest son and the high school costs of the younger one. 

The loan will be used to buy tools and improve the equipment to provide a better service.

loans.use: to buy equipment to provide better painting services.

loans.name: María Vicenta

texts.es:
La señora María tiene 40 años de edad, es madre soltera de cuatro hijos, tres varones y una niña. Ella se dedica a la fabricación de pan y tamales, actividades que tuvo que ejercer debido a su grandes dificultades económicas. Esa actividad la aprendió de su mamá quien se dedicaba a lo mismo. Tiene cuatro años de trabajar y comenta que le va muy bien, ya que su producto es muy reconocido en la zona donde vive. Mediante esta actividad ella ha logrado crecer a sus hijos, adquirir más experiencia y ser más conocida en su comunidad. 

María adquiere los productos mediante su nuevo compañero de vida, el cual ha visto en ella a una persona luchadora y honrada. Él le compra los productos en el pueblo más cercano que se encuentra a 12 kilómetros. A pesar de las dificultades para adquirir la materia prima, no hay obstáculo para que ella este estancada sin producir nada. 

La señora quiere ayudarle a sus cuatro hijos, que ella creció sola ha construir una casa que tenga mejores condiciones que la actual. Ellos ya tienen el bloque y el hierro. Pero les hace falta el cemento, arena y para el pago de mano de obra, es por eso que solicitan el préstamo a Fundación Campo.  Ella comenta que su mayor necesidad es contar con todo el dinero por junto para adquirir los materiales y poder terminar su casa antes que inicien las lluvias, puesto que no quiere volver a pasar por las mismas dificultades  que el año pasado.
texts.en:
María is 40 years old, and a single mother of four children; three sons and a girl.  She makes a living by making bread and tamales, work that she had to take up due to her great financial difficulties.  She learned this work from her mother who made a living doing the same.  She has had four years of work and says it is going very well, that already her product is well known in the area that she lives.  Through this work she has been able to raise her children, acquire more experience, and become better known throughout her community.  

María acquires the products through her new life partner, who saw in her a fighter and an honest person.  He buys the products in the nearest town which is located 12 kilometers away.  Despite the difficulties of acquiring the raw material, there is no obstacle that would leave her held up without producing anything.

She wants to help her four children, which she raised alone, by building a house with better conditions than the current one.  They already have the cinderblocks and iron.  But they are lacking the cement, sand, and the ability to pay for the labor, which is why they are asking for the loan from Fundación Campo.  She says that her greatest need is to have all the money together in order to acquire the materials and to be able to finish her house before the rains start, since she does not want to return to going through the same difficulties as last year.

loans.use: to buy cement and sand, and to pay for the labor.

loans.name: Oulimata

texts.fr: Madame Oulimata est une femme mariée de 30 ans qui s’active dans le secteur de la restauration. Elle a une expérience de 3 ans et a choisi son activité par opportunité. Ce qui l’intéresse  ce sont les flux financiers qui y sont générés. Elle est membre d’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC depuis octobre 2005. Elle sollicite un crédit de 300 000 frs prévu pour la réfection de son restaurant pour mieux attirer la clientèle et augmenter ses bénéfices .
texts.en:
Ms. Oulimata is a 30-year-old married woman who is active in the restaurant sector. She has three years of experience and chose this business by opportunity. What interests her is the flow of funds generated in it. 

She has been a member of a U-IMCEC branch offices since October 2005. She is requesting a loan of 300,000 francs for renovating her restaurant in order to draw in more customers and to increase her profits.

loans.use: to renovate her restaurant

loans.name: Ana Julia

texts.es: Doña Ana Julia Z.continua comercializando ropa por medio de encargos que su clientela le hace, es atraves de sus ventas el medio de ganarse la vida, señala la señora que mediante financiamientos ha venido aumentando su mercaderia, pero en esta ocasión el destino que tendra su credito es para el entechado de un cuarto y la terminacion del muro perimetral de su vivienda. Dentro de la misma infraestructura cambiara doce laminas de zin y hara uso de los siguientes materiales de construccion: hierro, bloques, arena, piedrin, alambre, estribos entre otros. Obteniendo con esto una vivienda mas digna para los suyos.Agradece a Kiva y Afodenic por su apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Ana Julia Z. continues to sell clothes by order from her customers.  It is through these sales that she earns a living.  She indicates that through the loans she has been increasing her merchandise.  

However, on this occasion she will use her loan to put a roof on a room and to finish the wall along the perimeter of her house.  She will change 12 zinc sheets. And she will use the following construction tools:  iron, cement blocks, sand, gravel, wire, and brackets, among others.  By doing these things she will have a nicer house for her loved ones.  

She is grateful to Kiva and Afodenic for the support they have given her.

loans.use: to put a roof on a room and to finish the wall along the perimeter of her house.

loans.name: Alimkhon

texts.ru: Алимхон проживает в районе Вахш. Ему 35 лет. Он женат. У него 3 детей. Его жена работает в дехканском хозяйстве (колхозе). Сам он при доме имеет участок земли, где сеет пшеницу. В этой области он восемь лет. Кредит берет для закупа минеральных удобрений.
texts.en: Alimkhon lives in the Vakhsh district.  He is 35 years old, married and has three children.  His wife works at a dekhan farm (collective farm).  Alimkhon has a plot of land by his house, where he sows wheat.  He has been in this business for eight years.  He is requesting this loan to buy mineral fertilizers.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers

loans.name: A'zamkhon

texts.ru: Аъзамхон уже три года как занимается посевом пшеницы. Ему 25 лет. Он женат. У него один ребенок. Его отец занимается садоводством. Аъзамхон берет кредит для закупа минеральных удобрений, чтобы внести в урожай пшеницы.
texts.en: A'zamkhon has been involved in sowing wheat for three years.  He is 25 years old, married and has one child.  His father is involved in gardening.  A'zamkhon is requesting this loan to buy mineral fertilizers in order to sow wheat.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Abubakarr

texts.en: Meet Abubakarr, a public lorry driver from the town of Kabala in northern Sierra Leone. Born in neighbouing Guinea, the 34-year-old now lives in Kabala town with his wife and two children. His wife is a businesswoman and his children are attending primary school. Abubakarr has requested a loan of 4,000,000.00 Sierra Leonean Leones (SLL) from Kiva lenders in order to buy spare parts to keep his vehicle road-worthy.

loans.use: to buy spare parts to keep his vehicle road-worthy

loans.name: Muhabbat

texts.ru: Мухаббат жительница города Кургантюбе. Ей 30 лет. Она разведена. У нее трое детей. Мухаббат занимается торговлей на рынке. Этим видом деятельности занимается пять лет. Кредит берет для покупки летней мужской и женской одежды.
texts.en: Muhabbat is a resident of the city of Qurgan-Tube.  She is 30 years old, divorced and has three children.  Muhabbat is involved in sales at a market.  She has been in this business for five years.  She is requesting this loan to buy men's and women's summer clothing.

loans.use: to buy men's and women's summer clothing

loans.name: Fatmata

texts.en: Fatmata is a businesswoman in the northern town of Kabala, Sierra Leone. Fatmata was born in Makeni. She is married to a teacher and has two children who are enrolled in college. Fatmata has been a businesswoman for 11 years now. She sells rice, groundnuts, etc. She has requested this loan to buy rice and groundnuts in bulk to add to her business.

loans.use: to buy rice and groundnuts in bulk to add to her business

loans.name: Saudatu

texts.en: Salone Microfinance Trust (SMT) is very pleased to present to you Saudatu, a businesswoman in Kabala town in northern Sierra Leone. Saudatu is 40 years old and was born in neighboring Guinea but now lives in Kabala with her husband and two children. Saudatu sells food items such as sugar, salt, margi (which is used for giving sauce a sweet taste), flour, etc. Saudatu has had over 20 years of experience in doing business. She has requested this loan to buy the above-mentioned items in bulk to add to her business.

loans.use: to buy sugar, salt, margi, flour, etc. in bulk to add to her business

loans.name: Phalla's Group

texts.en: Phalla is 36 years old and leads a two-member loan group. She is married with one daughter and two sons. All her three children are still in school. Phalla has been a farmer for fifteen years. This is her first loan with VisionFund. She is requesting the loan to cultivate her rice farm, and she hopes that it will give her good yield which she can sell for a good price, and thereby boost her income. She wishes that she can set aside some saving to support her children's education.

loans.use: To cultivate her rice farm

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Chhean

texts.en: Chhean, 57, is widowed and resides with her two children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been weaving Krama (a versatile, checkered print cloth) for over 20 years, earning approximately USD 10 per day. One of her children is an electrician who earns about USD 5 per day. In order to improve her business, Chhean is requesting a loan of USD 1,000 to purchase threads and cloth for weaving more Krama to sell. With the loan, she will be able to produce more Krama and generate more income to support her family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children get their undergraduate degree. She also plans to build a bathroom to provide hygienic living conditions for her family.

loans.use: to purchase threads and cloth for weaving more Krama to sell

loans.name: Kan

texts.en: Kan, 55, is married and resides with her husband and two children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been growing rice, mushroom and fattening up cattle for over 20 years, earning approximately USD 9 per day. Her husband helps her run the business. One of her children is a garment worker who earns about USD 4 per day. In order to improve her family’s livelihood, Kan is requesting a loan of USD 800 to purchase materials for growing mushroom. This purchase would enable her to produce more mushroom to sell and generate more income to support her family. In the future, she would like to use the profit to expand her business and build a fence around the house.

loans.use: to purchase materials for growing mushroom

loans.name: Srim's Group

texts.en: Srim is a villager of Prey Chhor District and the leader of this group with two female members. She is 35 years old and has two children who are still in school. She does rice farming and also raises pigs for additional income. She has been a farmer for almost 20 years. Srim received the first loan from VisionFund in 2011 and is now requesting another loan to cultivate her rice field and also buy ladders for her house. With this loan, she hopes to increase her rice crops to earn sufficient income to support her family, send her girls to school, and also have a proper house.

loans.use: To prepare land and grow rice on it

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Shamir Joel

texts.es:
Shamir es un joven optimista trabajador y sobre todo carismático, tiene un pequeño de 1 año de edad al que ama muchísimo y es su mayor adoración; su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de Nazca; ciudad que se caracteriza por su clima cálido, asimismo en esta ciudad se ubio una  de las culturas pre-incas más importantes de nuestro país que es la grandiosa cultura Nazca, sobre todo porque dejaron como legado uno de los atractivos turístico más importantes del país que son las Líneas de Nazca; son dibujos inmensos ubicados en un extenso campo de tierra árida y que según algunos estudios sirvieron como un calendario astronómico para la cultura Nazca. Cuando dispone de un tiempo libre a Shamir le gusta ver televisión en especial programas de comedio para distraerse, asimismo le gusta disfrutar es uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “puré con Adobo”.

Con muchas ganas día a día Shamir se levanta muy temprano para salir a trabajar en su negocio de venta de comida, pero no solo eso sino también tiene su negocio de crianza y venta de cerdos, se dedica a su negocio alrededor de 8 horas diarias, es muy organizado ya que trabaja en sus dos negocios de manera ordenada; el cree que le va bien porque es muy responsable, organizado y porque atiende a sus clientes de manera amable.

Shamir está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias al apoyo que le han brindado el podrá realizar un reforzamiento en los corrales donde cría a los cerdos, lo que permitirá tener un mejor espacio donde criarlos y evitar que se escapen de los corrales, así seguirá trabajando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño.” Tener un restaurante”.
texts.en:
Shamir is an optimistic, hardworking and charismatic young man who loves his one-year-old son very much. Shamir lives in Nazca, a city that is known for its hot climate and its role as one of the most important pre-Incan cities with rich, historic culture. The Nazca people left their legacy in the Nazca Lines, which are huge, extensive drawings in the desert, and, according to some studies, serve as an astronomical calendar for the Nazca culture. The Nazca Lines have become a major tourist attraction in Peru. 

When he has free time, Shamir likes to watch comedy programs on television, and he also enjoys one of his favorites dishes, the delicious “Adobo puree.” 

Looking forward to each new day, Shamir gets up very early to leave for work at his food sales business. He also operates a business raising and selling pigs, and he devotes 8 hours per day to his work. He is very organized, and manages to balance the work at both his jobs. He believes that work is going well because he is responsible, organized and treats his customers very well.

Shamir is grateful for the support that Kiva lenders have given him, and he plans to utilize the funds from this loan to reinforce and repair his pig corrals. These repairs will allow him to continue working and to eventually realize his dream of owning a restaurant.

loans.use: to improve his pig corrals.

loans.name: Jose Fernando

texts.es:
José, es agricultor, vive con su esposa y dos hijos, solo él trabaja en su familia, su esposa es ama de casa, el oficio lo inicio José cuando era muy joven junto a su padre, que ha sido tambien agricultor.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de insumos agrícolas como abono, herbicidas, insecticidas, esta compra le ayudara para tener los materiales necesarios e iniciar el proceso de siembra.
El objetivo de José es tener éxito en su labor, ya que quiere obtener una buena producción de maíz, para la alimentación de la familia.
texts.en:
José is a farmer, and lives with his wife and two children. He is the sole provider for the family, and his wife takes care of their home. José began working in agriculture at a very young age alongside his father, who was also a farmer. 

He is requesting this loan in order to purchase agricultural products such as fertilizer, herbicides and insecticides. This support will allow him to acquire the necessary materials to begin the seeding and planting process on his land. José’s goal is to be successful in his work, and to have a good yield of corn to feed his family.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural products such as fertilizer, herbicides and insecticides.

loans.name: Neris Alexander

texts.es:
Neris, vive con su familia, sus padres y hermanos, está soltero, todos trabajan en la familia, él se dedica a la albañilería, el comenzó a trabajar gracias al apoyo de su padre, pues él es tambien albañil.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de madera y herramientas para el trabajo, esta compra le permitirá tener lo necesario para realizar su función como albañil.
El objetivo de Neris es realizar un buen trabajo a los clientes, para ir ganando reconocimiento,  pues esto le dará un ingreso estable.
texts.en:
Neris is single, and lives with his family, which includes his parents and siblings. His whole family works together in the masonry business, and thanks to his father’s support, Neris also entered the masonry craft.

He is requesting this loan in order to purchase wood and other tools for his work. The support from this loan will allow him to fully perform his duties as a mason. 

Neris’ goal is to offer his customers fine work and to gain recognition, which will provide him steady income.

loans.use: to purchase wood and tools for his work.

loans.name: Kimberly

texts.en:
Inspired by her mother and utilizing her 25 years of experience in the salon industry, Kimberly opened Teinte Hair Salon and Studio in early 2012.  Using mainly organic and non-carcinogenic products, Kimberly hopes to create a pleasant and non-intimidating space for her clients to receive quality hair care.  

Teinte, the French word for color, is Kimberly's salon specialty.  Using and selling organic, non-cancer causing chemicals, she provides her clients with quality and safe products both in the salon and at home.  A New Orleans area native, Kimberly is a practitioner of yoga, a triathelete and volunteers with the local chapter of an organization that works with abused and neglected children.  Her salon reflects her caring and nurturing nature and provides a peaceful space for her clients.  The salon also serves as a studio to display the work of local artists, like her daughter.  

After other options to fund her business fell through, Kimberly turned to Kiva to help her business.  With her Kiva loan, Kimberly will purchase retail products and cover operating capital.

loans.use: to purchase retail products and cover operating capital.

loans.name: Oun

texts.en:
Oun, 52, is widowed and resides with three children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been selling groceries and dessert for over ten years, earning approximately USD 3 per day. Her daughter runs a beauty shop in the market and earns about USD 15 per day. And her two other children are construction workers. Approximately, they earn USD 6 per day. 

Due to difficulty with the family’s transportation, Oun is requesting a loan of USD 1300 to purchase a motorbike to commute. This purchase would enable her to use the money  saved on her transportation expenses to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and rebuild her present house to make it comfortable for her family’s living.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike to use to commute to work.

loans.name: Em

texts.en: Em would like to take a further loan to buy more products to sell from her stall. Em's previous loan enabled her to increase her sales and earn a higher income to support her family. She hopes that another loan will assist her in increasing the size of her business, attracting new customers and increasing sales. She also hopes that through the loan she can increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To purchase a greater variety of goods to sell.

loans.name: Keo

texts.en:
Keo, 40, is widowed and resides with three children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She is a homemaker. All of her children are employed. They are a fashion designer, a garment worker and a motor taxi driver. Approximately, they earn USD 12 per day. 

Due to difficulty with the family’s transportation, Keo is requesting a loan of USD 300 to purchase one more motorbike to commute. This purchase would enable her to use themoney  saved on her transportation expenses to support the family. In the future, she would like to run a tailoring shop for her daughter and build a new house to provide comfortable living conditions for the family.

loans.use: to purchase one more motorbike to commute to work

loans.name: Omar

texts.fr:
Omar est un homme âgé de 33 ans. Il est marié å une couturière. Il a 1 enfant de 3 mois. 
Omar travaille comme revendeur depuis 2009. Il vend des appareils électroménagers d’occasion pour tous clients dans sa boutique. Il achète les produits à Lomé. Il vend seul. Au moment, sa difficulté principale est la rupture de stock.
Omar a requis son second crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter des appareils électroménagers d’occasion. Il veut réinvestir dans l’activité.
Dans les prochaines années, Omar voudrait agrandir la taille de son activité. Il dit qu’avec les profits, il prévoit de prendre soin de sa famille.
texts.en:
Omar is 33 years old,  and is married to a seamstress. He has a 3-month old child. 
Since 2009, Omar has been working as a re-seller. He sells used household appliances to many different customers, in his store. Omar buys his products in Lomé. He works on his own. At the moment, his biggest challenge is depleted stock.
Omar has obtained his second loan from WAGES in order to buy used appliances. He wants to re-invest in his business.
Over the next few years, Omar would like to expand his business. He says that with the profits, he plans to take care of his family.

loans.use: to buy used appliances.

loans.name: Felix Octavio

texts.es:
Félix, administra una tienda, vive con su madre, está soltero, en su negocio ofrece productos de primera necesidad, tiene 5 años de experiencia.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de productos básicos, como por ejemplo: aceite, frijol, azúcar, jabón, para incrementar el inventario de productos, esto le ayudara para tener mayor solvencia en la atención a los clientes.
Su aspiración es ampliar el negocio, ya que quiere mejorar los ingresos familiares.
texts.en:
Félix manages a store, he lives with his mother and is single. His business offers essential goods and he has five years experience.
He is requesting a loan to purchase basic products, such as oil, beans, sugar, and soap. Increasing his product inventory will help him have greater solvency in customer service.
He aspires to expand the business, because he wants to improve the family income.

loans.use: to purchase oil, beans, sugar, and soap.

loans.name: Gansukh

texts.en:
Mr. Gansukh, 46, has been working as a plumber privately since 1995. He has three sons and lives with his family in a suburban district of Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. His wife has worked as a janitress in a state organization for many years. 

One of his sons decided to run a taxi service outside his class schedule. Actually he is a senior student in the college. His annual school fees are expensive for his parents. Therefore he always wanted to assist his parents through earning money by himself as far as possible. 

He needs to start by buying a car for his first business. It will not be so expensive; it costs about of MNT 5,000,000 in the Mongolian auto markets. But he is short MNT 2,000,000 at the moment. The loan he is taking will be dedicated to covering the remaining cost of the car he intends to purchase.

loans.use: To cover the remaining cost of purchasing a  car for his son to use as a taxi.

loans.name: Enkhjargal

texts.en:
Mr. Enkhjargal, 31, is a taxi driver and lives with his two children and his wife in a slum district of Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He has been running his business since 2008 and it is a main income source for his family now, because his wife is unemployed and she takes care of the housework and their kids.

 Lately his car has been running badly and is damaged in some of its parts. It has a bad influence on his business such as decreasing his earnings. So he decided to repair and renovate his car. The loan he is taking will be dedicated to purchasing the spare parts and  repairing his car.

loans.use: To purchase spare parts and repair his car.

loans.name: Santos Ana Isabel

texts.es:
Santos, vive con su madre, está soltera, vive en compañía de sus hermanos, ella se dedica a la alfarería, elaborando productos hechos de barro, aprendió desde muy pequeña, trabaja de 8:00am a 5:00pm, sus hermanos tambien trabajan en esta actividad, pues es algo de familia, elaboran recuerdos, muñecos de barro, tiene muchos clientes que les encargan.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de barro, leña, nacazcol, mano de obra y transporte, este préstamo es de mucha importancia para Santos, ya que tiene encargos de los clientes y necesita realizar la compra para comenzar a elaborarlos.
La aspiración de Ella es ayudar a su familia, a futuro colocar una tienda donde puedan exhibir los muñecos y recuerdos, para hace más atractivo su negocio.
texts.en:
Santos is single and lives with her mothers and siblings. She makes pottery from clay, an activity she learned as a child. She works from 8:00 am until 5:00 pm. It is a family profession, as her siblings also works as potters making souvenirs and clay dolls for their many customers.

She is requesting a loan to purchase clay, wood, and black dye and to pay for labor and transportation. Since she has customer orders and needs to buy these supplies to make the items they ordered, this loan is very important to Santos  She aspires to help her family. In the future, she hopes to have a shop where she can show her souvenirs and dolls and make her business more attractive.

loans.use: to buy clay, wood, and black dye and to pay for labor and transportation.

loans.name: Ana Esther

texts.es:
Ana, se dedica a la venta de calzado y ropa nueva, vive con tres hijos, quienes estudian, ella tiene un año en el negocio, lo aprendió de su madre, enseñándole el comercio y manejo de los negocios.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de sandalias, zapatos para ambos sexos, que sean de distintos estilos, esta inversión le ayudara para surtir el negocio, agregar nuevos estilos, mejorar las ventas con los clientes.
El objetivo de Ana es mantenerse en el negocio, poderse desplazar con otro local, con sus ganancias ir mejorando la casa y los beneficios para la familia.
texts.en:
Ana sells shoes and new clothing and lives with three children, who are in school.  She has been working in the business for one year.  Ana learned the business from her mother who is teaching her the trade and business management.

Ana is requesting a loan to buy sandals and shoes for both men and women that are different styles.  This investment will help to supply the business, add new styles, and improve sales with customers.

Ana's goal is to stay in business, be able to move to another location, and to improve the house and family benefits with her earnings.

loans.use: to buy shoes for both men and women.

loans.name: Dorally Andrea

texts.es: Dorally Andrea es una emprendedora que brinda los servicios de transporte, esta emprendedora ya ha venido trabajando con Fundación León 2000,  lo cual ha demostrado ser una responsable y con deseos de superación su mayor sueño es tener otra unidad de taxi y abarcar a sus clientes y brindarle un buen servicio. Actualmente está solicitando financiamiento para comprar materiales para la unidad como llantas, focos, y darle mantenimiento a la unidad.
texts.en: Dorally Andrea is an entrepreneur who runs a taxi service. She has worked with Fundación León since 2000 and has shown herself to be responsible and anxious to succeed. Her most important dream is to have another taxi to transport customers and offer them great service. Now she is requesting financing to buy tires and headlights and do maintenance for the taxi she owns.

loans.use: to buy tires and headlights and do maintenance for her taxi.

loans.name: Marvin Alberto

texts.es:
Marvín, vive con su esposa y tres hijos de 15, 12 y 7 años de edad, él se dedica a la venta de madera aserrada, desde hace 15 años está en el negocio, trabaja con distintas carpinterías ofreciendo madera.
Actualmente está interesado en la compra de madera para seguir proveyendo a las carpinterías, pues tiene varios pedidos y quiere aprovechar la venta, a través de un préstamo espera poder realizar esta inversión que le ayudara a ganar clientes y dinero.
La aspiración de Marvín es tener mayor reconocimiento de parte de los clientes, creciendo en la zona y poder estabilizar y garantizar a su familia un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Marvín lives with his wife and three children, ages 15, 12, and 7. He sells sawn lumber, and has been in business for 15 years. He works with various carpentry shops, selling them wood. 

Currently, he is interested in buying wood in order to continue supplying carpentry shops, as he has several orders, and wants to take advantage of the sales opportunity. 

Through the loan, he hopes to be able to undertake this investment, which will help him win customers and earn money. Marvín's ambition is to have greater recognition on the part of customers, to grow in the area; and be able to ensure a better future for his family, and provide them stability.

loans.use: To buy wood.

loans.name: Sara

texts.en:
Sara, 31, is married and resides with her husband in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She and her husband have been involved in growing rice and fattening up cattle for over four years. Additionally, she produces wickerwork baskets to sell to generate extra income to support the family. Approximately, she earns USD 5 per day.

 In order to improve her family’s livelihood, Sara is requesting a loan of USD 500 to purchase farmland for growing more agricultural crops. This purchase would enable her to generate more income to support the family. In the future, she would like to run an additional business of buying wickerwork baskets from villagers to resell and rebuilding her present house to make it comfortable for her family’s living.

loans.use: to purchase farmland for growing more agricultural crops

loans.name: Erdenetsogt

texts.en:
Mr.Erdenetsogt, 47, is a photographer privately. He has been doing his business since last year. It is his very first business by himself. He lives with his mother and his brothers in the slum district of Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. 

Every day he has had a lot of orders and jobs in the last months. That shows his business will increase and expand in the future as he believes. Now he is planning to work with one of his friends jointly. For that he needs more cameras and more equipment for their business. The loan he is taking will be dedicated to purchasing the additional tools for his photography business.

loans.use: To purchase more tools for his photography business.

loans.name: Sarom

texts.en:
Sarom, 47, is married and resides with her husband and nine children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been selling sweet cake (A Kor cake) for over ten years, earning approximately USD 5 per day. Her husband is a construction worker who earns about USD 3 per day. Three of her children are employed in a garment factory. Approximately, they earn USD 12 per day. 

Due to difficulty with the family’s transportation, Sarom is requesting a loan of USD 1300 to purchase a motorbike to commute. This purchase would enable her to use the  money saved on her transportation expenses to support the family. In the future, she would like to purchase a store to sell the cake and help her children get Bachelor’s degrees. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it bigger and comfortable for her family’s living.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike to commute

loans.name: Oureye

texts.fr: Madame Oureye vit au Sénégal et est âgée  de 56 ans. Elle évolue depuis plus de 10 ans dans le secteur du commerce c'est-à-dire dans la vente de tissus et de parfums. Elle a choisi son activité par  amour et s’intéresse  beaucoup aux flux financiers qui y  sont générés.  Elle est sociétaire dans l’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC  depuis mai 2003. Elle sollicite un crédit de 250 000 frs prévu pour payer une commande de marchandises qu’elle avait passé.  Les revenus que lui génère son activité lui permettent d’apporter un soutien financier à sa famille.
texts.en:
Mrs. Oureye is 56 years old and lives in Senegal. She has been working in trade for over ten years selling fabrics and perfume. She chose this activity out of love, and she finds the cash flow that it generates particularly appealing. 

Having joined a U-IMCEC branch in May 2003, she is now seeking a loan of 250,000F to pay for some merchandise she has ordered. The income earned through her activity will help her to support her family financially.

loans.use: to pay for an order of merchandise.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy fertilizer and seed for his chili crop.

loans.name: Sok Ny

texts.en:
Sok Ny, 37, is married and resides with her husband and four children in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in growing agricultural crops for over twenty years, earning approximately USD 2 per day. Her husband is a construction worker who earns about USD 4 per day. Three of her children are employed as garment workers and a construction worker. Approximately, they earn USD 8 per day. 

Due to difficulty with the family’s transportation, Sok Ny is requesting a loan of USD 1300 to purchase a motorbike to commute. This purchase would enable her to use the  money saved on her transportation expenses to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her agricultural business and rebuild her present house to make it bigger and stronger to provide convenient living conditions for the family.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike to commute

loans.name: Leisy Marilif

texts.es:
Leisy, vive con sus hermanos, todos son mayores de edad, ella administra una tienda de víveres y granos básicos,  tiene 5 años de existencia, surgió por iniciativa propia, debido a la necesidad de tener una fuente de ingresos.
Solicita un préstamo para la compra de mercadería como arroz, frijoles, pastas, aceites, condimentos, papel higiénico, detergentes, esto le ayudara a ampliar el negocio y la atención para los clientes.
La aspiración de Leisy es crecer con su tienda, ofreciendo un surtido de productos necesarios para las necesidades de los clientes.
texts.en:
Leisy lives with her siblings, who are all of legal age. For 5 years, she has managed a grocery and consumer staples shop that she opened on her own initiative because she needed a source of income.  

She is requesting a loan to buy merchandise such as rice, beans, dough, oil, condiments, toilet paper, and detergents. This will help her grow her business and service her customers. Leisy's aspiration is to expand her shop and offer a range of basic products to meet her customers' needs.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, dough, oil, condiments, and toilet paper.

loans.name: Yong

texts.en:
Yong, 43, is married and resides with her husband and six children in Kampong Chhnang Province, Cambodia. She has been selling groceries for over two years, earning approximately USD 3 per day. Her husband is a rice farmer who earns about USD 2 per day. Five of her children are employed in garment factories. Approximately, they earn USD 15 per day.

 In order to improve her family’s economy, Yong is requesting a loan of USD 600 to raise capital for her business to use for purchasing more groceries to sell. By doing so, she would be able to earn more profit to support the family. In the future, she would like to use the profit to purchase rice to store in a warehouse in order to resell it when the price is higher. Moreover, she plans to build a fence around her house and help her children get Bachelor’s degrees.

loans.use: to raise capital for her business to use for purchasing more groceries to sell

loans.name: Sey's Group

texts.en:
Sey, a villager living in Thmor Kol district, is 55 years old and married with nine children, four of whom live with the family and work part-time as construction workers.

Now leading a group of three female group loan members, Sey is requesting her first loan from VisionFund to cultivate her rice paddy during this hot season, hoping to increase her income. In addition to meeting the daily expenses of the family, she plans to set aside some money for future needs.

loans.use: to cultivate her rice paddy.

loans.name: Khon

texts.en:
Khon, 38, is married and resides with her husband and one child in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She has selling fruit for over seven years, earning approximately USD 9 per day. Her husband runs a public transportation service (motor taxi). Approximately, he earns USD 5 per day. Since the present motorbike is too old, Khon is requesting a loan of USD 1500 to purchase a new motorbike to replace the old one for her husband to run the service. 

This purchase would enable her husband to attract more customers and generate more income to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children get bachelor’s degrees. Moreover, she plans to rebuild her present house to make it bigger to provide enough space for her family’s living.

loans.use: to purchase a new motorbike to replace the old one for her husband to run the motorcycle taxi service

loans.name: Phina

texts.en:
Phina, 33, is married and resides with her husband and two children in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She is a chef. Additionally, she sells groceries at home and earns about USD 3 per day. Her husband is an arc welder who earns approximately USD 5 per day. 

In order to improve her family’s economy, Phina is requesting a loan of USD 1200 to purchase farmland for growing agricultural crops to generate more income to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her husband’s business and help her children get Bachelor’s degrees.

loans.use: to purchase farmland for growing agricultural crops

loans.name: Mann

texts.en: Mann is a mother of six children. Four of them are staying with the family and do rice farming. Mann and her family live in a wooden house in Thmor Koul district. As a farmer, she does not have sufficient income to support her family so she catches fish to resell for additional income. This is the first loan Mann received from VisionFund. She requested the loan to cultivate her rice paddy. With this loan, she hopes her rice crops will grow in good quality and increase in quantity so she can sell them for a good price so that her family can have enough food and live in better conditions.

loans.use: To cultivate her rice paddy

loans.name: Mao

texts.en:
Mao, 34, is married, resides with her husband and two children in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She and her husband have been working in a rubber plantation for over two years, earning approximately USD 5 per day. In order to improve her family’s economy, Mao wants to run an additional business. Therefore, she is asking for a loan of USD 1300 to pay for potato cultivation. This money will help her to acquire the security to start an agricultural business. 

In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children get Bachelor’s degrees. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it more comfortable for her family’s living.

loans.use: to pay for potato cultivation

loans.name: Neng's Group

texts.en:
As a mother of two children, Neng earns a living by cultivating her rice paddy and growing vegetables. She makes around three US dollars a day. After accounting for expenses, she can only save around one US dollar. She has used her savings to renovate her house and expand her business. 

Neng received her first loan from VisionFund in 2011. After completely repaying her debt, she requested another loan to prepare land for growing rice and vegetables. Now she leads a two-member loan group, both of whom are female. With the second loan, Neng hopes to save enough money to keep her boy and girl in school until they finish high school.

loans.use: To grow rice and vegetables

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Cleophas

texts.en:
Cleophas is a forty-three-year-old married man with two children living in Kasese. His hardships are price fluctuations, inflation and inadequate capital to purchase stock. His personal goal is to educate his children and his business goal is to expand his business to new markets.

Cleophas wants the money to buy sugar, rice and soap for resale.

loans.use: to buy sugar, rice and  soap to sell.

loans.name: Afi

texts.fr: Afi est une femme de 50ans. Elle est mariée à un retraité et a 03 enfants dont 02 à l’école. Le premier a 26ans et le dernier 18ans. Elle est revendeuse de pur water (eau minérale mise en sachet) depuis 1997. Une personne l’aide dans l’exercice de son activité. Elle est à son premier crédit et sollicite ce prêt pour acheter plus d’eau minérale. Elle veut récréer une autre activité (ouverture d’une boutique d’alimentation générale) et assurer un avenir meilleur à ses enfants.
texts.en:
Afi is a 50 year old woman.  Her husband is retired and she has three children, two of whom are in school.  The eldest of her children is 26 years old, the youngest 18.  She has been a retailer of Pur Water (mineral water stored in a bag) since 1997.  She has one person helping her with her business operations.

This will be her first loan, which she plans to use to purchase more mineral water.  She would like to start another business (open a general food shop) and ensure a better future for her children.

loans.use: to purchase bags of pure water.

loans.name: Reyna Isabel

texts.es: Doña Reyna es una mujer apasionada a su trabajo ya que desde hace 14 años se dedica a la venta de comida ambulante, agradece a Dios siendo este su principal apoyo y luego a la micro-fianciera. Asegura que aun siendo madre soltera manifiesta ser el pilar para sacar adelante a sus tres hijos. Por ahora su inquietud es seguirle reinvirtiendo a su negocio,con el fin de ofrecerle a su clientela un menu mas variado y aumentar sus ganancias, logrando asi un mayor grado de fidelidad por parte de sus clientes y una estabildad en el mercado al que ella se dirige.Para ello necesitara realizar las siguientes compras de granos basicos tales como: arroz, frijol, aceite, azucar, harina, maiz, entre otros productos. A futuro espera tener los recursos economicos necesarios para llegar a construir su vivienda e instalar tuberias en servicios higienicos, logrando con esto  mejores condiciones en pro de su familia.
texts.en:
Reyna is a woman passionate about her work, as she has been selling food as a street vendor for 14 years. She is grateful to God, and also to the microfinance institution, as this is her main livelihood.  She assures us that even as a single mother, she is the mainstay for raising her three children.  

At the moment, her concern is to keep reinvesting in her business, with the aim of offering her customers a more varied menu and increasing her earnings. In this way she will achieve a greater degree of customer loyalty, and stability in the market to which she is directing her efforts. 

For this reason, she will need to undertake the purchase of basic staples such as rice, beans, cooking oil, sugar, flour, corn, and other products. 

In the future, she hopes to have the financial resources to manage to build her home and install indoor plumbing; this way achieving better conditions for her family.

loans.use: To buy basic staples for her business.

loans.name: Aminatou's Group

texts.fr: Ce groupe est composé de deux personnes. La représentante du nom d'Aminatou est âgée de 50 ans. Aminatou est mariée et a trois enfants. Elle est a un niveau d'instruction secondaire. Pour supporter les charges quotidiennes, elle mène comme activité la vente de pagnes, parfums, jus de fruits dans une boutique depuis cinq ans. Elle s'approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans le but de satisfaire sa clientèle, Aminatou sollicite, ensemble avec sa coéquipière un premier crédit auprès de Finadev. La responsable est celle qui se retrouve à gauche de la photo.
texts.en: This group is made up of two people.  The group representative, named Aminatou, is 50 years old.  She is married with three children and has a secondary level education.  To pay her daily expenses, she has been selling cloth, perfume, and fruit juices in a shop for the last five years.  She buys her merchandise in a market in Benin.  In order to better serve her customers, Aminatou and the other member of her team are requesting their first credit through Finadev.  Aminatou is shown at left in the photo.

loans.use: to buy 20 packages of fruit juice and 10 pieces of cloth

loans.name: Moisés De Jesús

texts.es: Moisés de Jesús habita junto con su esposa e hijos en casa de su propiedad. Él se dedica al cultivo y comercio de los principales granos básicos como: maíz y frijoles. Año con año realiza la misma actividad dado que esta es la principal fuente de ingresos que posee. Es muy conocido en la zona como un hombre emprendedor, responsable y trabajador. Su familia es lo más importante y es la que lo impulsa a seguir trabajando duramente para llevar el pan de cada día. Su sueño es dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida por lo que ha decidido hacer este préstamo a INTEGRAL para invertir en los principales insumos agrícolas como: insecticidas, abonos, semillas, etc. Para continuar cosechando los granos básicos para su hogar y para el comercio de los mismos. Confía en Dios todo poderoso que de esta manera logrará su sueño de mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: Moisés de Jesús lives together with his wife and children in a house that he owns. He works growing and selling the leading basic crops such as corn and beans. Year for year, he carries out the same activity, since it is his main source of income. He is very well-known in the area as an enterprising, responsible and hard-working man. His family is the most important thing to him, and they are what drives him to keep working hard to provide their daily bread. His dream is to give his family a better quality of life, and for that reason he has decided to take out this loan with INTEGRAL to invest in the main agricultural supplies such as insecticides, fertilizers, seeds, etc., so he can continue harvesting the basic crops for his household and to sell. He says that he trusts in God Almighty that in this way he will achieve his dream of improving his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy insecticides, fertilizer, seeds, etc.

loans.name: Mario Alfonso

texts.es:
Mario, se dedica a la venta de marisco y es propietario de un equipo de pesca, él vive con su esposa y dos hijos de 11 y 8 años de edad, este negocio lo tiene desde hace 15 años, lo heredo de sus padres.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de pescado fresco y preparación del motor de la lancha, este préstamo le ayudara a mantener el equipo de pesca en buenas condiciones, y tambien aumentar los productos para la venta.
La aspiración de Mario es tener mejores oportunidades de crecimiento, comprando a futuro un nuevo equipo de pesca.
texts.en:
Mario works selling seafood, and he is also the owner of a fishing boat with equipment. He lives with his wife and two children, aged 11 and 8. He has had this business for 15 years, and he inherited it from his parents. 

Currently, he is requesting a loan to buy fresh fish and to repair the motor of his boat. This loan will help him maintain his fishing setup in good continue, and also to increase his offering of products for sale. 

Mario's aspiration is to have better opportunities for growth and to buy a new fishing setup in the future.

loans.use: to buy fresh fish and repair the motor of his boat.

loans.name: Teng

texts.en:
Teng, 45, is married and resides with her husband and three children in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She and her husband have been growing rubber for over twenty years, earning approximately USD 25 per day. In order to improve her business, Teng is requesting a loan of USD 625 to purchase more rubber plants to cultivate. By doing so, she would be able to generate more income to support the family.

 In the future, she would like to expand her agricultural business and help her children get Bachelor’s degrees. Moreover, she hopes to build a new house next year.

loans.use: to purchase more rubber plants to cultivate

loans.name: Philip

texts.en:
Philip is a 49 year-old widower with two children. He has been a livestock farmer for the past six years.

This is Philip's first loan from Kiva field partner Kadet Ltd.  He was introduced to Kadet by another borrower.  He plans to use the loan funds to build a zero-grazing unit on his farm.

His hopes and dreams are to become a prominent farmer within his locality.

loans.use: to build a zero-grazing unit for livestock

loans.name: Pov's Group

texts.en:
Pov is a villager of Tbaung Khmum district. She is married and has four children, two of whom are still studying. Pov supports the family by farming and spice planting. She can save around one US dollar a day after netting off the income and expense. This is her second loan with VisionFund. 

Pov is now the leader of a loan group with two female members. She requested the loan to cultivate her rice field and grow spices with the leftover money. Pov hopes the loan will help to increase her crop yield so as to increase income for her family so that she can renovate her house and keep all her children in school until they finish high school.

loans.use: To cultivate her rice paddy and grow spices

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Jonathan Alexander

texts.es:
Jonathan, vive con su esposa, en casa familiar, no tienen hijos, él se dedica a la venta de mariscos, compra los productos en el malecón, y los vende en otro departamento donde es poca la presencia de mariscos.
Solicita un préstamo para la compra de mariscos frescos como pescado, camarones, langostas, conchas, con esto podrá mantener su calidad en el producto y atender la demanda de los clientes.
La aspiración de Jonathan es comprarse un vehículo, en el cual pueda transportarse a distintas zonas, para ofrecer los mariscos.
texts.en:
Jonathan lives with his wife in the family home. They have no children. He sells seafood. He buys products at the harbor and sells them in another part of the country where there is little seafood.

He is applying for a loan to buy fresh seafood such as fish, shrimp, lobster, and clams. This way he will be able to maintain his product quality and meet customer demand. 

Jonathan's ambition is to buy a vehicle in which he can transport himself to various areas to sell seafood.

loans.use: To buy fish, shrimp, lobster, and clams.

loans.name: Bahriddin

texts.ru: Бахриддин трудолюбивый и добросовестный человек. Более 15 лет он занимается выращиванием сельхозкультур и он знаком с этим бизнесом с детства. После развала СССР он арендовал земельный участок, со временем арендовал участок земли в дехканском хозяйстве. От полученной прибыли он хочет женить своего сына. Бахриддин запрашивает займ для покупки минеральных удобрений и горюче-смазочных материалов.
texts.en: Bahriddin is a hardworking and conscientious person.  He has been involved in growing agricultural crops for over 15 years and has been familiar with this business since childhood.  After the breakup of the USSR, he leased a land plot and with time leased land at a dekhan farm.  He wants to use his profits to marry off his son.  Bahriddin is requesting this loan to buy mineral fertilizers, fuel and lubricants.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers, fuel and lubricants

loans.name: El Buen Amigo Group

texts.es: Doña Alicia es miembro del Grupo Solidario El Buen Amigo, tiene 62 años de edad, es casada y madre de 8 hijos, ella reside en la comunidad de San Nicolás. Su esposo trabaja en la agricultura. Doña Alicia se dedica al horneado de pan y a la elaboración de tableta, trabaja todos los días y lo hace sola ya que no tiene quien le ayude, los clientes le encargan los pedidos de pan y tableta, y en ocasiones cuando no lo puede vender todo sale a vender su producto. El único inconveniente es que debido al trabajo y por el calor del horno ha tenido problemas de salud y esto le ha ocasionado algunos gastos. El préstamo que doña Rosaura solicita es para surtir su negocio en la compra de productos como ser: harina, huevos, soda, sal, leche, azúcar, entre otros. Con la ayuda de este préstamo el nivel de vida su familia cambiaria, ya que podrá elaborar mayor cantidad de pan y tableta para ofrecerle mas a sus clientes. Su sueño es ver profesionales a sus hijos y poder ahorrar para hacerle mejoras a su casa. Doña Alicia ha sido cliente de FAMA desde hace veinte años y ha podido cumplir con sus cuotas puntualmente.
texts.en: Alicia is a member of the communal bank "El Buen Amigo" ["The Good Friend"]. She is 62 years old, married, and the mother of 8 children. She lives in the community of San Nicolás. Her husband works in agriculture. Alicia works baking bread and making tableta [coconut candy]. She works every day, and she does it by herself since she does not have anyone to help her. Her customers place orders for bread and tableta, and on occasion when she can't sell everything, she goes out to sell her products. The only inconvenience is that due to the work and the heat of the oven, she has had some health problems, and this has led to some costs. The loan that she is requesting is to stock her business by purchasing products such as flour, eggs, baking soda, salt, milk, and sugar, among others. With the help of this loan, her family's standard of living will change, since she will be able to prepare a greater quantity of bread and tableta to offer more to her customers. Her dream is to see her children become professionals and be able to save up to make improvements to her house. Alicia has been a client of FAMA for twenty years, and she has been able to fulfill her payment schedules punctually.

loans.use: to buy flour, milk, sugar, eggs and other ingredients.

loans.name: Subhi

texts.en:
Subhi is a 39-year-old married man who has three sons and one daughter.

For the past three years, he has been selling used home appliances such as stoves and washing machines.  It has been a profitable project for him. but he needs more capital to help cover costs and grow his business.  In the photograph that accompanies this profile, Subhi in shown in his store.

Subhi plans to use this $1,000 loan from Kiva field partner FATEN to buy used home appliances in bulk. He hopes this will allow him to offer his customers a wider variety of appliances, lead to increased sales, and improve his income.

loans.use: to buy used home appliances in bulk for resale.

loans.name: Chege

texts.en:
Chege is 52 years old.  He is married to Catherine and they have four children.  He is a farmer and has been in the business for the past 12 years.

This is his third loan with KADET ltd.  He paid his previous loans well and in good time.  He will use the funds from this loan to purchase fertilizer and pay for labor during planting.

He hopes to be a leading farmer in his area.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and pay for labor during planting.

loans.name: Lutfullo

texts.ru: Лутфулло трудолюбивый и добрый семьянин, который на воспитании имеет троих детей. Лутфулло раньше работал в России строителем. Он хороший строитель. Но вернувшись на Родину, на свой накопленный капитал взял землю в аренду. Многолетний опыт в земледелии помог ему получить хорошую прибыль. Он хочет в дальнейшем расширить свой бизнес и расширить площадь земли для посева. Лутфулло запрашивает займ для покупки семян, горюче-смазочных материалов и оплаты рабочей силы.
texts.en: Lutfullo is a hardworking and kind family man, who has three children.  Lutfullo previously worked in Russia as a construction worker.  He is a good construction worker.  After returning to his homeland, he used his saved capital to lease land.  His extensive experience in farming helped him to make a good profit.  He wants to continue expanding his business and the land area used for sowing.  Lutfullo is requesting this loan to buy seeds, fuel and lubricants, and to pay for labor.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fuel and lubricants, and to pay for labor

loans.name: Voeurn

texts.en:
Voeurn is 34 years old.  He is married and resides with his wife and three children in Takeo Province, Cambodia.  He has been selling fruits and vegetables for over seven years, earning approximately $6 per day.  His wife runs a food store and earns about $5 per day.  

Due to insufficient funds, Voeurn is requesting a loan of $1,300 to raise capital in his business in order to purchase more fruit for resale.  By doing so, he would be able to increase his profits and support the family.  In the future, he would like to use the profits to expand his business and to help his children earn bachelors degrees.

loans.use: to raise capital in his business and purchase more fruit to sell.

loans.name: Saidmurod

texts.ru: Саидмурод женат и ответственный отец четверых детей.  Много лет уже Саидмурод занимается выращиванием сельхозкультур, имеет в этом большой богатый опыт. В прошлом году, большие затраты на выращивание сельхозпродукции вынуждало его продавать скот  для выращивания сельхозкультур, чтобы получить хорошую прибыль от кукурузы и кунжут и вернут проданный скот. Теперь в этом году с целью сохранения поголовье скота он хотел бы получить займ для покупки семян и горюче-смазочных материалов. А также остальную сумму он хочет использовать для оплаты услуги техники и рабочей силы.
texts.en: Saidmurod is married and a responsible father of four children.  He has been involved in growing agricultural crops for many years and has a very rich experience in this field.  Last year, large expenses on growing agricultural crops forced him to sell livestock in order to continue growing crops. He wants to make a good profit from corn and sesame seeds and return the sold livestock.  Now, this year, Saidmurod wants to obtain a loan to buy seeds, fuel and lubricants in order to save the livestock headcount.  He also wants to use some of the money to pay for machinery services and labor.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fuel and lubricants

loans.name: Mom's Group

texts.en:
Mom is a 39-years-old mother of five children, all of whom are working as construction workers in Thailand. To support the family, she has been farming, growing vegetables and works as a construction worker to make additional income. She earns around three US dollar per day. 

Mom is a new client to VisionFund. She requested the loan to buy a water pump. The water pump will help her by not have to carry water from the river to water her crops and farm. She hopes to grow her rice and vegetables in good quantity and sell at good prices so that she can have more income for her family.

loans.use: to purchase a water pump.

location.town: Banteay Meanchey Province, Mongkul Borey District

loans.name: Eum

texts.en:
Eum is 64 years old.  She is widowed and resides with four children in Takeo Province, Cambodia.  She is a homemaker who receives support from the children.  All of her children are employed.  They are garment workers and waiters.  Together, they earn approximately $12 per day.  

In order to improve her family’s economy, Eum is requesting a loan of $1,000 to purchase a tuk tuk (a motorcycle pulling a passenger trailer or a three-wheeled motorcycle taxi) for her son to run a public transportation service. This purchase would enable her son to generate more income to support the family. 

In the future, she would like to rebuild her present house to make it more comfortable for the family.

loans.use: to purchase a tuk tuk for her son to run a public transportation service

loans.name: James

texts.en:
James is 32 years old, married to Ann and they have two children. He is a farmer and has been in the business for the past two years.

This is his first loan with kadet ltd of kes 50,000. He was introduced by a Kadet client. He will use the loan amount to purchase fertilizer and potato seedlings for planting.

His hopes and dreams are to be a leading mixed farmer in his area.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and seedlings.

loans.name: No

texts.en:
No, 33, is married and resides with her husband and four children in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She has been running a business of purchasing poultry to resale for over two years, earning approximately USD 20 per day. Her husband runs a public transportation service (motor taxi). Additionally, he is involved in breeding pigs at home to generate extra income to financially support the family. Approximately, he earns USD 5 per day. 

No wants to rebuild her present house. With this goal in mind, No is requesting a loan of USD 1000 to purchase construction materials to rebuild her house. This loan would enable her provide a comfortable living condition for her family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children get bachelor’s degrees.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials to rebuild her house.

loans.name: Danaya Group

texts.fr:
Mariées majoritairement dans des familles traditionnelles avec une moyenne d’âge de 27 ans et 2 enfants, les femmes du groupe Danaya habitent toutes dans la ville de Sikasso (3ème Région administrative du Mali) et se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté, de voisinage et de mariage. 
Elles  se sont spécialisées dans la teinture et vente des habits teintés. 
Dans le but d’augmenter leurs fonds de commerce, les membres du groupe intègrent Soro Yiriwaso et sont à leur 12ème cycle de prêt solidaire.
Madame Gnedjougou (première femme de la gauche vers la droite sur la photo) est un membre qui fat essentiellement la prestation de service. Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter, 10 cartons de teintures de colories différentes, 50 kilos de soude caustique et 2 chargements de charrettes en bois de chauffe.   Elle s’approvisionne sur place auprès des grossistes et effectue ses  prestations, à domicile, à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. Madame Gnedjougou compte réaliser avec ce prêt un bénéfice mensuel moyen de  185.000 FCFA qui sera utilisé, pour être réinvesti dans l’activité et prendre en charge les besoins du foyer en condiments.
texts.en:
Most of them married in traditional families and with an average age of 27 and two children each, the women in the Danaya group all live in the city of Sikasso (3rd administrative region of Mali).  They know each other through family, marriage, and neighborhood connections.  They specialize in dyeing and selling dyed clothing.  With the goal of increasing their business capital, the women are members of Soro Yiriwaso, and are on their 12th collective loan cycle.  

Mrs. Gnedjougou (first on the left in the photo) is a member who provides services.  She plans to use her loan to buy ten cartons of different colored dyes, 50 kilos of caustic soda, and two cartloads of firewood.  She buys from local wholesalers and runs her business out of her home for a customer base made up of men and women.  Mrs. Gnedjougou expects to make an average monthly profit of 185,000 FCFA, which she will use to reinvest in her business and buy spices for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for dye.

loans.name: Jiguiseme Group

texts.fr:
Mariées majoritairement dans des familles traditionnelles avec une moyenne d’âge de 26 ans et 2 enfants, les six femmes du groupe Jiguiseme habitent toutes dans la ville de Sikasso (3ème Région administrative du Mali) et se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté, de voisinage et de leurs activités professionnelles.  Elles  se sont spécialisées dans la teinture et vente des habits teintés. 
Dans le but d’augmenter leurs fonds de commerce, les membres du groupe intègrent Soro Yiriwaso et sont à leur 12ème cycle de prêt solidaire.
Madame Safiatou (première femme de la droite vers la gauche sur la photo) est un membre qui fat essentiellement la prestation de service. 
Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter, 50 cartons de teintures de colories différentes, 20 kilos de soude caustique et 2 chargements de charrettes en bois de chauffe.   Elle s’approvisionne sur place  à Sikasso, auprès des grossistes et effectue ses  prestations, à domicile, à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. Madame Safiatou compte réaliser avec ce prêt un bénéfice mensuel moyen de  180.000 FCFA qui sera utilisé, pour être réinvesti dans l’activité et prendre en charge les besoins du foyer en condiments.
texts.en:
Most of them married in traditional families and with an average age of 26 and two children each, the six women in the Jiguiseme group all live in the city of Sikasso (3rd administrative region of Mali). They know each other through family, neighborhood, and business connections. They specialize in dyeing and selling dyed clothing. With the goal of increasing their business capital, the women are members of Soro Yiriwaso, and are on their 12th collective loan cycle.

Mrs. Safiatou (on the right in the photo) is a member who provides services. She plans to use her loan to buy 50 cartons of different colored dyes, 20 kilos of caustic soda, and two cartloads of firewood. She buys from local wholesalers in Sikasso and runs her business out of her home for a customer base made up of men and women. With the loan, Mrs. Safiatou expects to make an average monthly profit of 180,000 FCFA, which she will use to reinvest in her business and buy spices for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for dye.

loans.name: Nelson Wilfredo

texts.es: Nelson Wilfredo de treinta y nueve años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos en casa propia. El posee una venta y reparación de celulares en el mercado municipal de la zona; últimamente se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues todo lo que comercia es de muy buena calidad y lo vende a precios accesibles, el negocio de los celulares es muy demandado además ahora que vamos a entrar de vacaciones quiere tener producto novedoso, para que la gente compre o repare sus teléfonos; Nelson es un hombre entregado a su labor, muy honrado y dispuesto a superarse, piensa que el  punto de partida para una nueva vida llega cuando te das cuenta de que puedes aprender cualquier cosa, que necesitas para lograr las metas que te has fijado; él se dio cuenta es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar celulares, repuestos, accesorios etc. Nelson Wilfredo tiene la fe puesta en Dios que de esta forma mejorara la situación económica de su hogar.
texts.en:
Nelson Wilfredo is 39, and lives with his life companion and their children in their own house. He has a business selling and repairing cell phones in the local municipal market. Lately he has gotten a lot of customers, as everything he sells is very good quality, and he sells it at affordable prices. The cell phone business has very good demand, and as the vacation season is now starting, he wants to have new product, so that people will buy or repair their telephones. 

Nelson is a man dedicated to his work; very honest, and ready to improve himself.  He believes that the point of departure for a new life is when you realize you can learn anything you need, to achieve the goals that you have set your mind to. He realized this, and that is why he is applying to Integral for a loan that will allow him to buy cell phones, parts, accessories, etc. 

Nelson Wilfredo has put his faith in God that in this way he will improve his household's financial situation.

loans.use: To buy cell phones, parts, and accessories.

loans.name: Lay

texts.en:
Lay, 57, is widowed and resides with three children in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in agricultural business for over 20 years. She has extensive experience and is successful in her career. Lay is involved in growing rice and vegetables to sell. She earns approximately 5 USD per day. Two of her children are employed. One is a garment worker and the other a construction worker. They earn about 8 USD per day. 

Lay wants to rebuild her present house. With this goal in mind, Lay requests a loan of 700 USD to purchase construction materials. This loan would enable her to provide convenient living conditions for her family. In the future, she would like to run an additional business in animal husbandry to generate more income and stabilize the family’s living condition.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials to rebuild her house.

loans.name: Cristina Del Carmen

texts.es:
Cristina, vive con su esposo y dos hijos de 12 y 8 años de edad, ella administra una tienda y chalet, tiene un año en el negocio, surgió por iniciativa propia y su esposo le colabora en la atención a los clientes.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de mercadería para el negocio, como embutidos, galletas, boquitas, dulces, gaseosas, jugos, para mantener surtido el negocio y mayor variedad para los clientes.
La aspiración de Cristina es desarrollarse con el negocio, instalar otro local, para aumentar la rentabilidad para el beneficio de su familia.
texts.en:
Cristina lives with her husband and two children who are 12 and 8 years old. She manages a store and cottage and has had the business for one year. She started it through her own initiative and her husband helps her to wait on customers.

She is applying for a loan to purchase merchandise for her business, such as sausages, cookies, snacks, sweets, soft drinks and juices in order to keep it well stocked and offer greater variety to her customers.

Cristina’s aspiration is to develop along with her business and to establish another store in order to increase profits, which will benefit her family.

loans.use: to buy sausages, cookies, snacks, sweets, soft drinks and juice.

loans.name: Esther

texts.en:
Esther is a 60-years-old single mother of five children. She is a poultry farmer and has been in the business for the past two years.

This is her first loan with Kadet ltd. She was introduced by a Kadet client. She will use the loan to purchase more chicks and poultry feed.

Her hopes and dreams to be a renowned farmer in her locality.

loans.use: to purchase chicks and poultry feed.

loans.name: Sareith

texts.en:
Sareith, 31, is married and resides with her husband and three children in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She and her husband have been working in rubber plantation for over two years, earning approximately USD 11 per day. Due to the difficulty in the family’s transportation, Sareith is requesting a loan of USD 1200 to purchase a motorbike to commute. 

This purchase would enable her to use the saved money on her transportation expenses to support the family. In the future, she would like to run an additional business to earn extra income to support the family. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her house to make it bigger and stronger to provide better living conditions for the family and help her children get bachelor’s degrees.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike to commute.

loans.name: Edith

texts.en:
Edith is a 65-year-old widow, and she has been selling clothes for the last ten years. 

This is Edith's first loan with KADET LTD, and she was introduced to KADET by an existing client. She plans to use the loan to buy more clothes for sale.

In the future, Edith hopes to invest more in her business and use the proceeds for poultry farming.

loans.use: to buy more clothes for sale.

loans.name: Gabino

texts.es:
Gabino es un padre de 43 de años, el mismo que se ha dedicado a brindar el servicio de transporte público en su moto taxi propia, la misma que pudo comprar ahorrando un poco de dinero y pagando poco a poco las cuotas que le hacían falta.  Gabino siempre trata de pasar tiempo de calidad con su hijo de 19 años, al cual cuida y mantiene solo debido a que su esposa ya no vive con ellos por algunos problemas familiares.

Gabino se ha dedicado a esta actividad cerca de 8 años, en las que ha aprendido y disfruta mucho de su trabajo, él siempre está pendiente de levantarse muy temprano para transportar a las personas que necesitan acudir a sus centros educativos o de trabajo, lo que le permite ganar el dinero que necesita para llevar los alimentos a su casa.

Actualmente el necesita apoyo económico con el fin de de poder comprar llantas, herramientas y hacerle un mantenimiento general a su moto taxi debido a que tiene algunas dificultades técnicas, Gabino es consciente de que este es su único medio de ingreso y es por eso que quiere que se encuentre en buen estado para no tener la carencia de alimentos en el transcurso de estos meses. Gabino quiere salir adelante, mejorar la calidad de vida de su hijo y así en un futuro no muy lejano poder ponerlo a estudiar una carrera profesional y desde luego comprarse una nueva moto taxi, ya que la suya ya es muy vieja y se está deteriorando.
texts.en:
Gabino is a 43 year old father.   He has devoted himself to providing public transportation in his own “moto taxi” (three wheeled motorized vehicle).  He was able to buy the taxi by saving a little money and, little by little, making the payments he needed to make.  

Gabino always tries to spend quality time with his 19 year old son.  He takes care of and supports his son by himself.  This is due to the fact that his wife no longer lives with them because of some family problems.

Gabino has been doing this business activity for close to eight years.  During these years he has learned, and he enjoys his work a lot.  He always gets up very early in order to transport the people who need to go to their educational centers or to work.  This allows him to earn the money he needs to bring food home.

He currently needs financial support to be able to buy tires, to buy tools, and to perform general maintenance on his moto taxi.  It has some technical difficulties.  Gabino is aware that this is his only form of income.  That is why he wants to have it in good condition.  He does not want to lack food in the coming months.  

Gabino wants to get ahead and improve his son’s quality of life.  This way, in the near future, his son will able to study for a professional career.  Then Gabino will buy a new moto taxi because his is very old, and it is deteriorating.

loans.use: to buy tires, to buy tools, and to perform general maintenance on his moto taxi.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: Maria de 45 años, vive con su esposo y tienen dos hijos en las edades de 19 y 22 años. Ella  y su esposo tienen una piladora de maíz, mediante el cual realizan la tarea de trillado y lo venden, así como también lo comercializan entero,   oficio que aprendieron por tradición familiar con sus respectivos  padres. Quienes desde hace 12 años se lo vendieron  y desde ese momento, esta pareja se dedicó a la  actividad, con la que hoy  generan los ingresos para sostener su hogar, dependiendo  totalmente de ella.  Su meta es ampliar la posibilidad de comprar maíz,  para generar mayores utilidades y lograr la sostenibilidad esperada. En la actualidad Maria está aplicando a un credkiva, con el cual comprará en mayor volumen maíz, para ofrecer mejores precios, pues  con este sistema de compras obtiene descuentos. También planea abordar un nuevo mercado, comprando para la venta  ñame y plátano, pues tiene pedidos que esperan ser cumplidos. El éxito de esta inversión es que conoce muy bien su clientela y trabajará sobre pedidos de sus mejores compradores a crédito.
texts.en:
